“…. What …I …just …said …till …now…” (Fei)

“WHERE YOU EVEN LISTENING !???” (Fei)

“I will go right away and talk to Miranda then !”

“LISTEN TO PEOPLE GODDAMNIT”

ugh

The former God happened to be even more troublesome than what Fei thought her to be…

 

The scene where a vermillion haired girl dashing away with shining eyes… and a boy apostle, desperately chasing her was witnessed by the onlookers.

 

 

This world is beyond cruel.

……

 

About 2 percent.

That is the total percentage land, usable by the people living in this world.

Even if you include the area explored and being developed by the Mystic court, the numbers will still fail to cross beyond 7%.

So, what about the remaining 93% ?

That is yet to be explored.

It is perhaps a fine grassland, but where giant dinosaur known as ‘Retschs’ roam.

Some part of the land is scorchingly hot. A sand prison where humans will collapse in less than an hour.

And then there is the sea…,

inhabited by giant aquatic creatures that can swallow a ship whole.

 

Humans can never become the ruler of the land. They are not allowed to…

Even this miracle city ruin, if not protected by these steel walls surrounding it, the inhabitants and the buildings would had been preyed upon and destroyed in a single night; by herd of Retschs roaming on the land. [TL note: Retschs = Dinosaurs]

Human need Power.

Power to fight

Power to survive

Power to live in the cruel world and till its bitter end.

Apostle Dormitories

“But still… The Gods really have put on a lot of thought na~”(Fei) In the dorm room, where Fei finally returned after half a year, He laid down on his bed and staring at the ceiling.

It is necessary for human to develop this unexplored land. But, if alone. It might as well be impossible.

That is the reason why humans are in need of the game “Play Of Gods.”

 

The Seven Articles of The Play of the Gods

Rule 1: Those who receive the divine curse “Arise” from the gods become apostles.

Rule 2: Those who receive the divine curse “Arise” will gain the power of either a superhuman or a mage.

Rule 5: As a reward for winning the game of the gods, a portion of the power of the Divine Curse can be used in the real world.

 

This miraculous power blessed upon humans by the gods.

That is the Divine Curse “Arise”.

With this blessing,

A human was able to escape even from the dinosaur Retschs.

Mages, with their magic make the scorching winds of the desert lands become cool. Within them, there are some even capable of blowing away the giant aquatic creatures of the sea.

it was a power that was limited to be used only in the “Play of Gods”. But by the rules, if a human, an apostle wins a Game against a God, this power, which was limited to the “Play of Gods” was made available for them to be used in the real, cruel world.

This power is now a necessity for the exploration of the unexplored lands.

It is not needed to win all those 10 matches. Just winning one or two games is enough. This alone will allow the humans, the apostles to use the respective divine spell into their world.

“The Gods invite humans to play with them in order to pass time, and those who win against them will be able to use the power of the divine spell “Arise” in the real world. The power to explore unexplored lands. ……” (Fei) The interests of both parties are aligned.

The Gods can enjoy and play the games as much as they like to, and on the other hand ,humans get the power to explore the unexplored outside world.

This is:

“The Play of Gods.”

 

It is the best entertainment for mankind with also a place to gain the power to challenge and conquer the outside world.

This makes the Mystic Court, practically, a World Government, and its Apostles, praised by the people as World Heroes.

“…… Well. That’s why I wondered why they worried so much about me too.” (Fei) “Huh!? Are you planning to leave the Mystic Court!?” (?) “There’s a girl I want to find.” (Fei)

“Oi Oi, Fei-kun, you… are you serious!?” (?)

A photo hanged on the wall where Fei is living in.

That was the photo of the team where when Fei was still a member. He had no complaints with that team. Even Fei himself thought that he will continue to be in that team from then on.

Yes…

It was so until 6 months ago, when Fei heard of a rumor about a woman who looked similar to “That Person”.

“Fei, you’re here again today? Good, good. Let’s play a quick game then ~.” (That Person) “Go ahead and challenge me for real. Because that’s the most fun ~.” (That Person) She was an Onee-chan with flame like vermillion color hair. She was the same elder person who played with Fei when he was still but a child. In his memories, she was the person who loved games more that anyone else in the world.

…… I owe it all to her.

….. It is all because of her.

Even now that I am able to win in the “Play Of Gods” is all due to her. Her training me extensively in playing Games.

 

But

One day, she suddenly disappeared.

Chapter 1.14

Translated By: Darkapta

 

Even now that I am able to win in the “Play Of Gods” is all due to her. Her training me extensively in playing Games.

 

But

One day, she suddenly disappeared.

For that reason, Fei is searching for her.

Because

After finding her, He wants to say, wholeheartedly.

“Thank you”

“It’s all because of you that I am here. Thank you.”

 

“But still… why am I unable to recall her…” (Fei)

Yes,

unfortunately, Fei is unable to remember the name of the Onee-chan whom he met in childhood.

We used to play together.

But, not only her name, Even her face appears to be vague in my memories, it’s hard to recall.

The only thing I remember is that her hair. The color of her hair. Like a burning flame, of Vermilion color.

Yes, the exact same color as that of the Dragon God Leo Reche.

Even her unparalleled lover of games is same as her. For a moment it even crossed my mind that “Perhaps… She…”.

But it’s definitely not her…

Since if it was her, it would actually be strange if Reche was not able to remember him.

Moreover, Reche was just excavated out of an ice wall about a year ago. Whereas Fei used to play with this Onee-chan till several years ago. While it can be said that Reche was still asleep in that thick ice wall.

Rather than the wrong person, it’s kind of like a wrong ‘God’.

They look very alike. ……

“…… It’s really strange, isn’t it?” (Fei)

While moving myself from side to side while lying on my bed, I unconsciously had a mocking smile on my face.

“I never thought I’ll ever come back, or be invited to a team, moreover by a former God. To challenge in the “Play of the Gods.” (Fei)

 

Presently, it was Midnight one o’clock.

Even though it was supposed to be bedtime, there was not even an ounce of drowsiness afflicting Fei.

He could not get the face of her, Reche out of his head.

Not because she was a God, but because, she had features quite similar to that Onee-chan he admired even now.

“No, Reche is a different person, rather, she is a former God. I know that. I should keep this disturbed self only till today. From tomorrow I have to behave calm again.” (Fei)

…….

“What about me?” (Reche)

“Well, it’s course not….. Reche! Wait a minute!?, why!?” (Fei)

He jumped up as if he had been blown apart.

Looking at Fei who was trying to sleep; was a girl with curious eyes, with bright flame-like hair, wearing the same a tank-top, as previously in the day.

Why… how are you here?

This was Fei’s private room, and the door also was supposed to locked.

“Manager Head Miranda gave me this duplicate key. She said “You can hunt him down whenever you want ~.” (Reche)

What about the safety obligations of the Mystic Court towards their workers?!

RATHER! WHAT THE HECK DOES THIS HEAD MANAGER EVEN WANT TO DO !?

“Now then ~, let’s get ready, it’s time for the Midnight game ~.” (Reche)

“……Hai?!” (Fei)

…………

 

“RUNNNNNNN !” (Fei)

“THEOOOOOO !?” (Reche)

Ah… My hand …it’s caught….

Just as Fei grasped that thought, he was thrown out from the window of his living room.

He falls head-on onto the Outer Garden in the first floor from the third floor of the dormitory.

“Agh” (Fei)

He stopped after rolling for some time after landing on the garden ground.

Fei’s Divine Blessing belonged to the ‘Super-human category’. Thus, he had physical resistance better than a normal human being.

Rather, if it had not been for this Physical resistance, he would not have been able to escape without getting a full body fracture.

“What Are You Trying To…. ..eh?” (Fei)

In front of Fei, who just landed onto the outer garden, was a huge stone statue with the head of a dragon. That too with the height of about 5 meters..

The Colossal Door Which Connects The Human Realm To The Upper Spiritual Realms.

A heritage from the Ancient Magic Civilization.

By going through this stone door, Apostles are able to enter the Upper spiritual realms, to the “Playground of Gods.”

“… Why is it here? Wasn’t the mystic court keeping it within the ‘Dive room’ ”? (Fei)

“I carried it out from there, on my back.” (Reche)

“A THIEF !!!…” (Fei)

By the way… it is not about how many kilos does this weigh. It is about how many TONS does this weigh….

… Moreover… I’m wondering …how was a girl, who has a smaller build with more delicate features than me, carry a five-meter-tall stone statue on her back.

…….

NO NO NO…

weren’t there guards there to stop her?

“I think there was a guard around there… in the place this giant statue was kept… at the Dive Center.” (Fei)

“I explained them gently.” (Reche)

The former God cutely winked at Fei.

“I just told them, ‘Don’t you dare come in my way’, and all of them stepped aside.” (Reche)

“… care to explain which part of this considers count as gentle?” (Fei)

“I just borrowed it for a while. Its just the right time, see, the statue of the Giant God is calling, we can enter now. Good right!” (Reche)

The back of the mouth of this Dragon’s head stone statue was shining.

This was how the Gods gave a sign when inviting the Humans to play in their realm, in the upper spiritual world, Playground of Gods.

“You were saying at noon the other day right. Before we go to challenge the Gods to Games, we need to practice our teamwork; understanding each other and being mindful of each other’s thoughts.” (Reche)

“…… Yeah, but then…” (Fei)

“And so I thought, Why don’t we just do that ‘practice’ on ground !” (Reche)

“…… That is no longer a practice…” (Fei)

“But I can’t wait any longer!” (Reche)

The girl with flame-like vermillion’s hair held out her hand to Fei.

Her cheeks dyed in cute red color due to excitement.

She looked so cute that Fei’s had unknowingly held her hand with his breath staring at her innocent wide smile relentlessly.

“I have been waiting for someone like you so long.” (Reche)

As she told so, she grabbed the hand of Fei, as they jumped into the shining mouth of the dragon head stone statue.

 

Chapter 2.1

Translated By: Darkapta

 

 

Chapter 2: Game against the Giant God Titan: God Pretend

‘The Play of Gods’ as orchestrated by the Elder Gods.

The entire procedures is said to have been finalized by the ancient magic civilization.

They were as follows:

 

The seven rules of the game of the gods.

 

Rule 1: Those who receive the Divine Curse Arise from the gods become apostles.

Rule 2: Those who receive the Divine Curse of Arise will gain the power of either a superhuman or a mage type.

Rule 3: All games of the gods take place in the spirit world of the gods’ playground, Elements.

Rule 4–The power of the Divine Curse Arise can only be exercised in the Playground Elements of the Gods.

Rule 5: However, as a reward for winning the gods’ game, a portion of the power of the Divine Curse ‘Arise’ can be used in the real world.

The more you win, the more power you can unlock in the real world.

Rule 6 — Lose the challenge after a total of three defeats.

Rule 7: Defeat the god 10 times to clear the challenge.

Rule 8: Win 10 times against God, and you will receive the “Glory of God Celebration”.

 

But…

The Gods were incredibly whimsical in nature…

Even the type of game that would be up in the challenge was based upon the mood of the God at that time and the God they were up against.

It is like,

even if the game one is challenged to, is similar to some games previously played or even if similar to the human version of that said game.

The difficulty of the present game was not guaranteed to be the same as them. Rather the difficulty cannot be determined.

“Reche! Reche!” (Fei)

A path vibrant with light.

Even though that tunnel of light was hardly even a few meters in length.

Fei was troubled.

A small sigh escaped from his mouth.

Because

Reche was not with him.

It seems that she was so excited by the path that she lightly hopped throughout the light structured tunnel, and in the process, she was now waiting for Fei where the path ends.

 

…Well, I can still turn back if I want to.

…Till I cross this path completely, I can actually return back to human world.

But…

That choice was not probably impossible to begin with.

Since, Reche was waiting for him at the end.

“…. It was so fun mon ~. Really! It even made me hop throughout the path of light.” (Reche) [TL note: Bunnies… Bunnies]

She gave out a huge exhale to hide her strained smile.

We both really are cut from the same cloth.

Both of us are so excited to play, games with Gods that its unbearable to stay put. Just the thought of which game might await us in the “Playground of Gods”, makes us even more impatient and anticipating.

“Bring it On” (Fei)

Fei’s hands automatically transformed to fist.

Do-kun Do-kun

While feeling the beats that reverberated through my chests I said…

“THIS… THIS IS THE VERY REASON I AM HERE FOR!”

As he said, he jumped into the world of the Gods. The world where the Gods lived.

The world where the Gods anticipate his arrival…

–The Gods’ Playground Elements “Ruin Illusion vs. Titan, the Wise God of the Earth The Game Begins.

 

Spiritual Upper World “Playground of the Gods”.

This place changes its appearance in a thousand different ways depending on the wish of the God who is its owner.

The place Fei arrived at after that dive was…

“Huh!?” (Fei)

It was the Miracle city “Ruin” if I remember correctly. Even The Mystic Court that I saw after returning, this morning, was at the exact same place.

“It looks very familiar, but… wasn’t this supposed to be already the “Playground Of The Gods?” (Fei) “Fei! Here! Here!” (Reche)

A voice reverberated from the city square.

The origin of that voice was a girl with long flame-life hair. She was calling him, waiving her hand to him on the air.

“Uuuu. I can’t wait anymore!!! Ne ne ~ Fei, what do you think would be the game we will be challenged to?” (Reche) “Even I do not know… Rather, shouldn’t you know about it better than me? Weren’t you previously a resident over here, also a former God?” (Fei) “Are you not familiar with the fellow Gods that reside here?” (Fei) “Hmm? Nope.” (Reche)

The girl carefreely shakes her head sideways.

“Humans tend to associate all Gods alike, but that’s actually not quite true. Just as even when if you lump cats and whales together as ‘animals’, they are fundamentally different.” (Reche) “So, you all are not actually associated like friends?” (Fei) “Un… Even the God over here. They might not actually know who I am or was.” (Reche) Even though Reche was of the opinion that “Its normally different”, the same was not actually applicable to Fei.

The reason is simply because, Fei didn’t have any opportunity to talk with any God before.

Even from the eyes of the Mystic Court, this was an information that their researchers would do anything to get their hand on. Yep, definitely, so.

…… I guess in the past year, no one cared to even ask Reche about herself. They were probably too afraid to even approach her.

…… Well, that must have made even a former God such as Reche feel lonely.

I am sure that it was probably because of this reason that Reche had her eyes shining even before the game would actually begin.

“Ah Right! Reche, I would not be wrong to call this place as the ‘Playground of Gods’ Right?” (Reche) I looked around at the buildings.

The time of day was dusk.

The silvery glow of the buildings, the intersections, the exquisite dirtiness of the traffic lights. All was a perfect recreation of the cityscape Fei had walked through earlier this morning.

However, there were no living beings.

Well, not even a single insect can enter the spiritual upper world. The only ones who can enter are Apostles, who were granted permission to pass by the ritual which provided them with the divine spell ‘Arise’.

“Why is the residing place of a God is the place resembling to Human’s dwelling place?” (Fei) “Hmm… Even I don’t understand the mental processing of the other Gods ne ~” (Reche) “See — there are several people accumulating there, lets try going over to that place.” (Reche)

What Reche pointed to was the center of the city, the city-square.

There was a total of sixteen people in all present there.

I guess that makes one team.

But as soon as the other apostles wearing ceremonial robes of the Mystic Court noticed Fei, they all turned towards at once.

And —

“Fei?”

“That’s him!?”

“Why is he here ……?”

There was a big buzz.

The new rookie who represented the last year’s God battles was suddenly participating with them. It’s no wonder they were surprised.

Chapter 2.2

Translated By: Darkapta

 

The new rookie who represented the last year’s God battles was suddenly participating with them. It’s no wonder they were surprised.

“Fei, what’s happened till now? I heard that you took a leave!” (?) “Oh, thank you for your help until now Asta, it’s been a while. Actually, I just came back in this afternoon, today.” (Fei) I made a small bow towards that familiar female apostle.

Asta Canarial—

Three ranks above Fei. She was a passionate lady apostle who would just turn 20 this year. She had challenged the ‘Play of Gods’ twice with Fei in the past. Such was their relationship.

“HAA!? You just returned this morning, and you already want to participate!?” (Asta) “What about rehabilitation? Even if that is you, if you spend time in vacation, your intuition is bound to become dull.” (Asta) “Iyaaa… Even I had similar motifs… but well, was dragged by a certain someone.” (Fei) “Let’s all do our best ~” (Reche)

Reche appeared from behind of Fei.

Just at the same moment, the surrounding Apostles screamed at the top of their voice backing away almost immediately.

“Drogon God!?”

“Le, Leoreche-sama!”

“W-Why here?!”

“I will also be joining you. I’m on the human side, so you need not worry.” (Reche) And…

Just at the very moment…

“Hello and Welcome to our Divine Playground.”

 

On top of Reche’s head.

A small, light green object came down flapping its tiny wings.

“I am a terminal spirit – ‘Meep’, who lives in the realm of the Lord God Titan. I don’t have a name, so please feel free to call me Terminal Spirit – ‘Meep’.”

God does not interact.

The terminal spirit – Meep is like an intermediary who dictates the rules of the game on behalf of the said God.

 

“Now that it’s about time, we will be starting the participation to this game. Umm, 18 people in total right? …”

 …

“Ne ne ~ Your hue appears to be a little different ne ~.”

The terminal Spirit Meep sat on the tip of Reche’s shoulder.

As expected, of the follower of God.

It seems to have found out the sense of similarity with Reche and determined her to be different from us, fellow humans around here.

“And you are?”

“I’m a former God. I can participate too right?” (Reche) “Yes, there are no issues. Anyone is welcome to join us in the game.

Well then, sorry to keep you waiting ~ Let me introduce you to the game of my God Titan!”

“…… It’s a fighting battle game anyways, right?”

The captain of the apostles took out a thin mechanical terminal.

– Built-in application [Encyclopedia Biblia].

It is a data book provided by the Mystic Court having aggregated all the information about games played in the “Play of Gods” by human beings all over the world. It contained information of every games that have appeared in the game with Gods till date.

“Titan, the Giant God, as per our database, always challenges to a battle game that’s about fighting. If we defeat Titan with our 18 players, we will win. Right?”

Battle Game—

One of the most popular game battle type in the “Play of the Gods”.

In other words, “A Great Brawl”.

In other words, a fight between humans and gods.

Even though the apostles are given the power of the divine spell ‘Arise’, the power of the apostles in comparison to that of the gods is like the difference between heaven and earth.

Therefore, rules are established according to each God, such as, in the case of A Great Brawl:

‘humans win if the god kneels down’ or ‘humans win if the god is overturned’.

“About Titan, the Great God… Well, there are records about him as the captain says!”

The girl apostle also pulled out the Encyclopedia-Biblia.

“This is it, isn’t it? The number of encounters in the last thirty years were about twenty-three according to the world statistics. The winning rate is…… about 17 percent for our number of people.”

The win rate on the human side in the ‘play of gods’ was about 13 to 17 percent.

Titan, the Giant God

The game content, the win rate… its just like with respect to any standard Gods.

“That’s convenient, Captain. If it’s a game about combat, pure power, we have the Dragon God Leo Reche with us. Though if the gods help us though…”

“No.”

That one voice of the terminal spirit – Meep that cut through the Apostle girl’s words, shocked everyone there.

“My Master, Titan, has expressed his discontent, he got tired of the battle-type games.”

“…… Hue?” (Captain of the Apostle group)

“Then let me say it to you yet again.”

“The game will be ‘God Pretend’!”

 [TL note: God Pretend: 神ごっこ]

 

…… What’s that?

Silence prevailed in the entire plaza.

Fei and Reche were in exact same state of mind as experienced by the other apostles.

None could figure out what the game means.

God Pretend?

I’ve never heard of a game like that before.

“Then please enjoy it to your fullest.”

“Wha!? Wai.. wait a bit. Speaking of Titans, it should have been a game battle on fighting, Power…” (Captain of the Apostle group) “It seems my master desires to play a different type of game.”

“…… !?” (Captain of the Apostle group)

The captain turned pale while holding the encyclopedia in her hand.

The Gods are unpredictable, erratic and whimsical.

Even the statistics of 100 years old Mystic Court tend to get easily overturned with their single decision, But…

To think that the God Titan will become whimsical at this very moment…. it was really uncalled for.

“Then, are there any other questions?”

“Then let me ask”. (Fei)

“Is that game, in short, similar to Tag (with a Devil)?” (Fei) [TL note: Oni Gokko; 鬼ごっこ]

As he said so, he pointed towards the scenery where they are at to the terminal spirit – Meep.

The cityscape of the Miracle City, Ruin. The streets were devoid of any form of garbage and the buildings were lined up like the original place were all according to the rules of the game.

…… I can vaguely see now how it works now.

…… So, we’re supposed to use these buildings in the cityscape as obstacles in order to run away from the demon… in this case from the god, just like the game of tag.

It all made sense now…

Even the reason for this Upper spiritual realm resembling that of a human city.

“From what I can grasp, this area is approximately a few hundred square meters. Within the confines of this area, we, the human side would just have to run away from the God, Titan. That’s why instead of Tag (of Demons), it is Tag (of Gods)”. [TL note: Demon Tag, Oni Gokko = 鬼ごっこ; While God Tag, Kami Gokko = 神ごっこ].

“Exactly, it’s just as you pointed out.”

Chapter 2.3

Translated By: Darkapta

 

 

“From what I can grasp, this area is approximately a few hundred square meters. Within the confines of this area, we, the human side would just have to run away from the God, Titan. That’s why instead of Tag (of Demons), it is Tag (of Gods)”. [TL note: Demon Tag, Oni Gokko = 鬼ごっこ; While God Tag, Kami Gokko = 神ごっこ].

“Exactly, it’s just as you pointed out.”

Terminal spirit – Meep pointed towards the far horizon.

It was as if the curtains of blue light was creating a border around the cityscape holding them together.

“This time, game is being limited to this area. You are not allowed to go outside that boundary light. The field is made to have four corners, so, please run from Master Titan within the area these four corners.”

“Okay… Now I understood that completely.” (Fei) However, the real mystery is perhaps somewhere after this part.

You see,

Till one really try to solve it, know about it, you might not be able to grasp the hidden layers in this rules.

“If this is by the arrangement as per the original Tag (Demon), will we lose only when everyone is caught, correct?””

“――――”

Smile…

[TL note: the terminal spirit smiled]

 

The gaze of every Apostle concentrated towards the terminal spirit, as, the terminal spirit – Meep laughed.

“Hmm, isn’t there also another rule for defeat ne~?”

“EHHH!”

The human response to the spirit’s reply were divided into two patterns.

 

 

 

1.      The Apostles with their eyes rounded, opened wide.

 

 

 

1.      And another were like Fei and Reche, who closed their mouths at the same time and went into a deep expression in their thoughts.

“Hmm… Understood… I see…” (Reche?)

Reche’s mouth turns into a fearless smile as she folds her arms.

“There are other conditions which would lead to defeat even if all members aren’t annihilated. Doesn’t that mean that there is way to lose even if you do not get caught right.” (Reche?) “Fei, were you able grasp anything else?” (Reche) Fei shook his head in denial to the question Reche asked.

“No, nothing yet.” (Fei)

This God Tag requires one to runs away such as to not get caught from that giant god Titan. In short, it has the same rules as that of its demon version which is commonly known to everyone.

…… However, the defeat conditions were something unsettling.

…… In addition to the Demon Tag, the case where “One can get defeated even if they were able to stay uncaught”… is possible? How can that be EVEN BE allowed?

Even if you manage to be uncaught, throughout the game, you can lose.

But…,

when you take a look from the opposite angle, doesn’t it mean…

“Our victory conditions doesn’t seem to be that simple too, heh?” (Fei) I looked up at the terminal spirit – Meep drifting on the air.

“Run away to win. But that’s not enough for victory, is it?” (Fei) “Yes. I will repeat again, in this “God Tag” one can be victorious if they manage to run throughout and not get caught. But even if you manage to not get caught, you can lose.”

Un… the terminal spirit – Meep nodded in agreement.

“Also, Titan sama is very kind, thus he was telling me to provide you all with three hundred seconds before starting the game. Everyone can run far away in the mean… oya?”

A thunderous rumbling shook the place.

The sound of huge footsteps intensified as it approached them.

“Arere…? I was still in the middle of explaining things though.”

What the terminal spirit – Meep turned and looked at… was…

Something which was seeing from the gaps of the twenty storied skyscrapers. Having its whole body covered… rather made up of lava colored rock; looking at them with its head exposed.

[TL: Tsundere heh]

Titan, The Giant God.

It was the first time for Fei to witness ‘that’, real thing, in person.

“Arara, it seems Titan-sama was unable to wait any longer… And so with that, the prior start time will be defaulted! Good Luck Everyone! Do your best to outrun Titan-sama!.”

“WAIT, WAIT, WAIT, WAIT, WAIT, WAIT, WAIT!”

The screams of Reche with all other Apostles reverberated the scene.

 

And just after…

The Titan’s massive arm shattered the steel skyscraper into pieces.

 

The sign was given—

 

The Play Of Gods,

VS Giant Titan.

Game Type “God Pretend”.

【Victory Conditions】 ?????

[Defeat condition 1] That everyone is caught by God Titan.

【Defeat Condition 2】????? (You can get defeated, even if you manage to escape.)

THE GAME STARTS.

 


 

The Titan’s massive arm shattered the steel skyscraper into pieces…

Crushed by the Titan’s fists,

The outer walls of the building came down, turning into thousands and thousands of steel debris.

The debris, larger than the size of Fei began to fall to the ground.

“Kyaaaa!!?” (Probably every other lady apostles) “DEFEND!!” (Captain of the Apostle group) “YOU WILL GET CRUSHED OTHERWISE!!” (Captain of the Apostle group) The atmosphere was of complete chaos.

Screams and Cries reverberated the area.

The first ones to move where the apostles having the blessings of Superhuman Strength. With the reaction speed and leg power unknown to humans, they kicked away those falling rubble.

And then,

The it was the turn for the apostles with the blessing of Supernatural abilities.

“KONOHA! KRITZ! FAST! PUT UP A BARRIER!” (Captain of the Apostle group) “I—I AM ON IT!” (Konoha)

“ACTIVATING!” (Kritz)

Wind type and Gravity type magic was used by the apostles.

The apostles who were of about the same age of Fei, extended their hand on to the skies and…

The clouds burst open.

A stormy wind erupted in the very place as it exterminated all the rubbles regardless of its size.

…. Such were the power of the ‘Arise’,

A Curse, a Blessing given upon humans by the Gods.

A power deemed extremely important, indispensable, in order to compete with the Gods.

And when you challenge in a large force, because of this, one is able to stand against and rival these Gods, the Gods, who LOVE to play a game based on strength.

All were of the same idea.

That being in a large force is necessary.

All But one….

Fei.

And that too… in an uncomfortable way…

“……. Oi OI OIII?!” (some mob apostle)

As the cold drops of sweat traversed down the spine of Fei; Fei jumps back towards the rubbles… (and), The Titan at full speed.

Chapter 2.4

Translated By: Darkapta

 

As the cold drops of sweat traversed down the spine of Fei; Fei jumps back towards the rubbles… (and), The Titan at full speed.

Fei’s spell of Arise is a bit different.

It is not actually capable of dealing with rough objects.

His ‘Arise’ was not completely of the Superhuman category, while it was not at all like the Supernatural category who could stop the huge falling rubble of stones.

Still, he went forward.

……..

“Get away Reche, this might get dangerous—” (Fei)

“What might?” (Reche)

The girl with flame like Vermilion hair turned around and looked as if saying “Really?”.

and…

The same girl without looking back up, shot up a punch directed towards the falling rubbles….

And….

The result….

All the falling rubbles turned… crushed into dust…

A shockwave..

A tremendous shockwave burst towards the skies, some strokes even stroking the unguarded skin of Fei standing near her.

“……A..a…. un… nope…. It’s nothing actually.” (Fei)

Fei looks at the shattered fragments, dust, which were now falling on the ground.

They were not just destroyed…

They were pulverized

into…

Chocolate? Aren’t the pieces falling look like melted chocolate…

This was the state of ‘them’ without even the direct contact with Reche’s Fist.

….. As expected of The Great (former) God

….. Telling herself to be ‘The Manifestation of Fire in human form’ was indeed not just for show.

Well, now to mention…

Now I kind of understand now, that, why Head Manager Miranda continuously reminded me to not offend or irritate her… We would definitely not want anything like this in real world too…

…. And…, for some reason… the person in question… is smiling… grinning for some time now.

“Hmmmmm?” (smile) (Reche)

“….. what is with those incredibly unscrupulous smiles…” (Fei) [TL note: unscrupulous meaning devious/sly]

“You have a surprisingly cute side, don’t you . You look calm, but you got worried for me, right . but, did you become worried about my safety? You thought that I might get hit by those sharp pieces of debris and became worried right? “ (Reche) “Right ~?” (smiling, smirking I guess xD) (Reche)

As Reche finishes, she brings her face closer to Fei suddenly.

Fei’s mind was blank

He was unable to think, unable to respond.

… It was just that, Fei was somehow feeling emotions of extreme embarrassment after that conversation.

“I… I understood that there was nothing to worry about.“ (Fei) “Anyways, let’s run away for now. Firstly, by the theory corresponding to the classic Tag (Onigokko).” (Fei) “Un… no objections.” (smile) (Reche)

They run from the open space towards the space with many buildings.

To not get caught by the person with the role of the Demon… was the first standard rule of the game of Tag (Onigokko).

“So… Are the people from the other sides okay too?” (Fei) There were in total of 16 apostles running behind Fei.

In that event of the building getting destroyed, if only one person was able to escape out of it. The result would actually be not anything strange. But. The fact that all are able to come out of the safely, is in a way astonishing.

…… Rather. Isn’t that just a signal given by God Titan to start the game.

…… That would mean, from now on, the real thing is about to come.

Fei looked back.

And as if confirming his beliefs, one of the apostles towards the end cried out loud.

“Captain! The God Titan has started to move!” (some mob apostle) The building; crumbled.

As those buildings crumbled, out of the thick dust came a rock giant that was close in height to a skyscraper.

The Titan was looking at the humans on the ground… its eyes were shinning…

And then, The Titan began to run straight towards them. Every step it took created incredible shockwave and explosive sounds. With every impact on the asphalt ground, loud screams of shattering sound reverberated the area.

“WHA!? FAST!?” (some mob apostle)

“CAPTAIN ITS IMPOSSIBLE! EVEN THE SUPERHUMAN APOSTLE CAN’T WIN AGAINST THAT SPEED!” (some mob apostle) “The Magician Squa…” (says softly) (Captain of the Apostle group) “NO, IT’S STILL IMPOSSIBLE!” (some mob apostle)

“PLEASE DON’T FORGET THIS IS THE CENTER OF THE CITY!” (some mob apostle) The captain instructed pointing towards the main street…

“SCATTER!” (Captain of the Apostle group)

“HIDE IN THE SHADE OF THE BUILDINGS.” (Captain of the Apostle group) “FROM THE TITAN’S POINT OF VIEW, WE ARE ALL JUST ANTS. SO, RUN AWAY AND HIDE. JUST AS ANTS HIDE BEHIND GRASS.” (Captain of the Apostle group) “HA!” (ROGER!) (All Apostles)

 

The participating apostles began to start running towards different buildings.

Fei and Reche too does as the captain asked. The apostles divided into six group of three, as each start moving towards separate, different buildings.

“…..haa…. haa… haa… *sigh” (tired) (?)

“Playing Tag with a Giant like that. If games like this is asked upon, Wizards like me would have no role to play!” (?) The one saying these was Asta. A sempai of Fei. She continuously criticized the game while somehow managing to hide behind the wall of a building. She was clearly out of breath.

Her Divine blessing, ‘Arise’ is that of the Supernatural category.

Unlike the Superhuman Category, there is almost no elevation on the physical capabilities.

Running to this point continuously was definitely a struggle for her up until now.

“It was supposed to be a game of Tag… But what we are now actually doing is perhaps a game of ‘Hide and Seek’ eh?” (Asta)

From the shadow of one of the buildings, an apostle, it was as if a boy apostle looked towards them.

The apostle was not actually an acquaintance of Fei. but by what it appeared, he possessed a Superhuman type of “Arise”. Since, even though chased by the Titan, even after running till all the way here, there was no discomfort in his breath.

“The difference between our capacity (The Titan and Superhuman apostle) is so much that even I, a Superhuman type is at a disadvantage. Peeping from the shadow of the building is the correct approach. Actually, why don’t we just hide in deep inside this building?” (Vice-Captain) “Yes, I too think the same vice-captain. If we enter from the backdoor of the building, then perhaps we won’t get noticed!” (Asta) “That would be a bad decision. You should probably leave it Asta sempai.” (Fei) “Hue?” (Asta)

As she was moving towards the backdoor, and turned to look towards Fei, her proud golden hair fluttered around in the air.

[TL: Hair fetish? Hmm… who knows?]

“Why.. why Fei?” (Asta)

“Going and hiding inside the building might be really dangerous. First of all, the risk in taking that decision without knowing its dangers is irresponsible.” (Fei) ZUNNN…

(sound of footsteps)

By the footsteps of Titan, it seemed to appear that the Titan was slowly coming towards them.

Even though Fei was unable to see whether it was true or not, he could understand that the Titan was near and coming towards them.

“The God is probably roughly aware of the path we took to escape.” (Fei/Reche) “That’s why we should hide inside the building!” *(Asta) “Well, if The God feels like it, he could just destroy the building. whatever path you take to escape, one way or the another, it will catch up to you.” (Fei) If you get found out, its instant defeat.

Then…

Why not take a silver line of hope and hide inside the building, praying that we don’t get caught in the destruction of the building.

That option would definitely be valid but for a normal game of Tag.

but…

“I will say it again, it’s really a bad idea. You’ll never be able to win with that.” (Fei) “Why?… why won’t I!?” (Asta)

“Because ——! “ (Fei)

“Cra*! sempai run over here!!!” (soft voice) (Fei)

“Hue? Is something wrong?” (Asta)

Asta was standing still, unknowing of her surroundings.

She was so into the conversation that she did not realize.

That.

From just the opposite side of the building, from the very back, a face..

larger than that of an elephant,

Of a God, was looking upon her from there.

 

…… It found us that fast!?

…… Was it because of our voice? Smell?

OR

Both!?

There is no time to contemplate.

“Asta! Run towards us!! “ (Fei)

and…

“Don’t look back!!“ (Fei)

“What happened vice-captain?” (An Apostle next to the vice-captain) Don’t turn back.

But…

That was impossible

Even if someone is asked not to, there is no human who would not, when said to.

Asta unconsciously looked back at the person the boy who called The vice-captain.

And then ~

 

“ky…… K Y A A A A A A A A A A H H H H H H H ――――――――…………” (Asta)

Chapter 2.5

Translated By: Darkapta

 

“Asta!?” (Vice-Captain)

She was crushed by a body which would weigh at least thousand tons. The result was nothing other than instant death.

 

‘The inability to act’ – omission.

 

The wounds received in this upper spiritual realm doesn’t have any effect on the actual body.

Also,

Even under the foot of that huge being, there was no remnants of Asta present. The most probable argument would be that she was perceived to have lost and thus sent back to the mortal realm.

“a… eh… I…?” (Asta)

The Asta who should had been crushed without remains, stood up from the dust on top of the asphalt road.

Without any scratch in her body whatsoever.

The girl who should had been in a dire situation being crushed under the giant foot of Titan, now appeared in front of Fei without any harm.

And it would appear that she herself is also unable to understand her present condition.

“……Asta sempai, are you alive?” (Fei)

“Eh, ah, I thought I was eliminated from …………………I – I Y A A A A A!?” (Asta) This is when the abnormal event starts to occur.

The upper part of the body which was supposed to be crushed. The clothes began to be dyed in a color of fresh red paint.

Of the color same as that of The Titan God.

“Asta-senpai!?” (Fei)

“Wha… What the h**l is happening Fei! What’s going on with my body!?” (Asta) “And… Wh.. Why is (my) magic starting by itself!?” (Asta) The upper body of the Apostle Asta which was crushed moments ago, was now giving out an orangish-reddish color while her hands put forth pointing towards her fellow apostles.

“Don’t Tell Me… “(Vice-Captain)

–A Tempest.

The wind storm shot by Asta being somehow dodged by Fei (by a hair breadth) went towards the standing apostles in its path, throwing them away. Those thrown away slammed to the buildings present one after the other.

“ASTA! HAVE YOU LOST YOUR MIND!?” (Vice-Captain)

“Noo…, you’re wrong Vice Captain! My body… it is moving without my permission!” (screaming) (Asta) She has her will intact… however, her magic, her body is not responding to her will.

Looking at the standing Titan, Fei bit his lips…

“It really is… God Pretend…”(Fei) [TL note: Here, possession is being implied]

“Hidden rules… Well, I am of course prepared for that you know. It’s the fight with God’s wisdom too! That is why…”(Fei) In the first place, the word “Gokko” means imitation.

So, in this game, those who are captured by the God Titan become his subordinates and turn into our enemies; thus ‘God Pretend’.

The first Hidden Rule

 

–Hidden Rule #1.

–In this game of playing God, those who are captured by the divine Titan will become the divine Titan’s minions and will be attacked by him.

 

It is kind of same as in the board game known as “Shogi”, where the captured pieces can be used as their own indigenous pieces.

“I guess you also understand it right Reche… That for humans, apostles, challenging in groups has a higher probability of victory when against the Gods.” (Fei) and Reche comments:

“But this time, it seems otherwise…” (Reche)

And shrugs her shoulders.

As, since in this “God Pretend”, the apostles who are defeated are not eliminated, but rather turned into pawns, in control of the God.

This strategy of the God Titan;

A rule which uses the numeric value of apostles against them. A rule which can be told as a splendid technique to outdo the notion of humans and put it against them. [Tl note: notion of challenging in greater numbers, in groups.]

“Vi… Vice-Captain! Run Away!” (Asta)

“IS THAT A LINE ONE TELLS WHILE REPEATEDLY INVOKING WIND SPELLS TOWARDS US!?” (Vice-Captain) “… Argh!? ah… Oh no…” (Vice-Captain)

Asta, who was now reduced to just a pawn dancing on the hands of Titan, invokes her Wind spell yet again.

Disbalanced by the strong winds, the vice-captain falls down.

The Titan then swung down his heel towards the incapacitated Vice Captain, easily crushing the vice-captain who had failed to escape.

He too got taken out.

Just like Asta, now the vice-captain, who was also defeated by the God Titan was also dyed the same color as the God.

Or so was the only one thought to have been converted…

But…

“Eh?!” (?)

As Reche’s eyes widened, the screams of astonishment from men and women echoed throughout the building district.

It wasn’t just the vice-captain.

Even his subordinates standing near had their upper body slowly dyed into the same color as that of the Titan’s lava.

“That… How can that Be!” (One fellow apostle, converted)

“Why? Even when we both are not even touched!?” (The other fellow apostle, converted) ….. What does it mean!?

…… These two people weren’t even touched by the God Titan or the vice-captain.

A Decision through contact?

That is, even if not being touched directly, if one is in a certain proximity near the God or its pawns, they will be deemed as “Touched by the God”.

If this is so, then it is possible.

[TL note: Proximity means a kind of like ‘a close surrounding area’]

“… Fei… it might be bad for us too…” (Reche)

“Ah Reche. Don’t go near them even by mistake. Let’s get away from here!” (Fei) Asta, the Vice-captain, and with them, two other apostles.

Fei and Reche turned their back towards those four persons and ran across the building-streets in order to escape from that place.

“So now, the God side is now four in number.” (Fei)

“If you add the God Titan, then 5…” (Reche)

“Then that brings us to 14 vs 5 then.” (Fei)

From Humans 18 versus 1 God, it was now humans 14 versus 5 Gods.

And it was still early in the game.

Without even an hour completing in the clock, with the greater probability of the apostle side losing in complete annihilation, the number force of the apostle group with respect to the God, was reversing.

…… It’s also a great loss that the first one to get caught was Asta-senpai.

…… Her magic is perfect for stopping or halting the God in their tracks.

 

The more powerful the apostles are, the harder it is to deal with them when they turn to the enemy side.

And…

Asta’s wind magic is not actually beneficial to the escaping side, but when it is in the capturing side, it harbor’s its full potential The potential of a lethal threat.

『――――』

The Titan Began To Look Down Upon The Ground.

Chapter 2.6

Translated By: Darkapta

 

『――――』

The Titan Began To Look Down Upon The Ground.

 

It was looking down at Fei and Reche, but suddenly turned around the opposite direction to them.

“He changed his direction? Then is he not planning to come for us then?” (Reche)

“…… Perhaps he will come for us later? But still, ‘Perhaps’ though.” (Fei)

The God Titan might have understood somehow.

That someone completely different from the other apostles, a Former God, Reche, is here, participating.

“If he targets everyone other than us then it would be God 17 versus Humans 2. Perhaps he is thinking of this strategy to later come for us, a strategy to gather the rest of the apostles with then help of the turned over apostles-pawns for now.” (Fei)

“What do you mean ‘Pawns’ ……..!?” (?)

The one shouting was an apostle already converted to the God side, The lady apostle Asta.

Her upper body being dyed with the lava, and her movements controlled…, but it would seem that her mouth was not prone to the control.

“But, aren’t you now just a pawn, also Asta sempai, your lower body would still seem to be of the original color… don’t you think the color balance is quite off?” (Fei)

“SHUUUTTTT UUPPP!” (Asta)

“Also, Why are you still being so carefree Fei! Hurry up and Get away from here! My body… It is going towards you without my own permission, therefore!” (Asta)

“Don’t worry, even if you don’t tell us, we will run away.” (Fei)

They secretly surpassed the building from its shadows and went straight towards the East.

On the other hand, the apostle-pawns of the Titan went towards a different direction. They might have found out the locations of other apostles. Thus, going after them destroying buildings one after the other as it advances.

“…… That guy is crazy… It is taking down the steel buildings in packs as if it is nothing.” (Fei)

“Umm Fei.. I think, we too might be in quite some danger.” (Reche)

Reche, who was running just beside me, said so looking at her side.

Implying towards Asta who was following them.

“That human… Isn’t she abnormally fast?”(Reche)

“Its definitely not the ability of Asta sempai… It might be a boon due to converting into a pawn of the God.”(Fei)

In addition to the fact that the distance between them is not increasing even with Fei’s all-out sprinting, Asta, who is chasing them is not even having any trouble with her breath.

“This is troublesome… If this goes on, I might be the first sone to go out of breath.”(Fei)

“Hey Fei… I somehow might have understood something interesting about this game… something like a hidden technique.”(Reche)

Eh? What?

Reche pointed towards the back with her eyes by her eye-line.

“Let’s obliterate that person. If I burn her till even her ashes does not exist, it will definitely make her discontinue. Well, At least the number of the God’s side would lessen, you know.” (Reche)

“Kowa!?” [TL note: meaning scary, I can’t find a word which would justify this reaction. Ugh.]

It is an idea which might never come to Fei. Truly an idea which is devoid of being a human.

And indeed. If Reche became serious, even if it is an apostle, who have turned into a pawn of God Titan, erasing them out of existence is very much possible.

There is no doubt regarding that…

But……

“Its an incredible hidden trick… But it’s a no.”(Fei)

“But Why?”(Reche)

“Well, it’s true that I would feel sorry and guilty towards Asta sempai, but moreover, it will not leave a positive feedback.” (Fei)

To the confused Reche, Fei pointed out a very straightforward answer.

“In Games, One who wins while being true to his principles enjoys that outcome in complete. And, if I have to win, I want to win with my complete determination, with the best I can do at present.” (Fei)

“Against the Brain Battle with God” (Fei)

“Ho Ho..” (Reche)

“…… What is it?”(Fei)

“Nope, just thought that this thought pattern is so much like you. So its fine, with what you want then!” (Reche)

and…

Just after that,

Reche suddenly made a huge skip and with instantly, accelerated.

The voice boomed, reverberating.

“Fei , over here over here~” (Reche)

“That’s why I am telling, YOU ARE GOING WAY TOO FAST!” (Fei)

“…… Ah! Also Reche, one more thing. So how are we going to deal with the Asta sempai following us from behind?” (Fei)

From the god’s side, only Asta was chasing them. There were no other apostle that seem to be following them.

“That person is being manipulated, but that’s within the rule of this game of ‘God Pretend’. In other words, she is not yet eliminated. Is that understanding correct?” (Fei)

“Yep, and in our, God’s case, all eliminated apostle are sent back to the real mundane world immediately.” (Reche)

So…

 

“I see” (Fei)

“If that’s the matter… then.” (Fei)

In the mind of Fei, still running, one possibility emerged.

“This game might have another rule hidden…” (Fei)

They went to the back of the commercial building.

And then…

Fei made a sign to Reche with his eyes.

He then hid himself into the shadows, holding his breath.

Asta, followed the gaze incidentally given by Fei, and as a result, passed right in front of him—

“Eh?” (Asta)

the confusion was obvious, because…

Fei suddenly disappeared from her sight.

Perhaps due to the sudden disappearance of Fei, a human who had been running in front of her just a few seconds ago;

hiding behind a garbage dumpster.

Asta’s motions halted.

“Try to have a bit more ‘Patience’ Asta SeMpaI~” (Fei)

“Seino ~” (Fei)

“Hyaaa ~~~” (Asta)

From the darkness Fei threw a trash box from the street corner towards her.

Without missing its aim, that trash flew towards the head of Asta,

hitting and blindfolding her.

“I told you right, your outfit is just too unbalanced right ~.” (Fei)

“Even if it is dyed in the same color as God Titan, why only the upper body ~.” (Fei)

“Wai.. Wait a minute Fei, what do you mean to say?” (Asta)

“Reche” (?) [TL note: perhaps Fei is taking help from her? OR it can also be Asta calling her.]

Chapter 2.7

 

Translated By: Darkapta

 

 

“Wai.. Wait a minute Fei, what do you mean to say?” (Asta) “Reche” (?) [TL note: perhaps Fei is taking help from her? OR it can also be Asta calling her.]

 

“Hoi ~. And with this, connection established.” (Fei)

“Hyaaaaa!?” (Asta)

Asta jumped in astonishment.

Well, that is quite natural.

 

Being made to wear a trash box,

then having her vision temporarily blocked,

and then in this condition,

having your buttocks felt by someone or somebody.

 

Yep, it will definitely make anyone … astonished… [TL note: angry xD]

 

“Oi, Oi Fei! YOU BRAT! Suddenly making me wear a trash box on my head AND on top of that FEELING Ma… MY BUTT!!!” (Asta) “YOU HAVE QUITE SOME COURA—” (Asta)

 

“But Sempai, with this you are on our side again see~” (Fei) “Hue?” (Asta)

 

The lava color began to peel off from Asta’s upper body gradually. As she threw away the trash box covering her, the dyed color was almost gone.

and..

 

In the blink of an eye, she was back to her usual self.

 

“eh? EHHHH? …… I… I CAN MOVE!?” (Asta)

 

“Sempai got turned into the God’s side but were actually not eliminated. Since the lower body wasn’t yet dyed in its color ~.” (Fei) “Then.. that means, a hidden rule of returning back to the human side is also attached?” (Reche?)

Asta involuntarily raises her voice.

“EH! AH! Understood!” (Asta)

 

– Hidden Rule 2

 

– Touching the Human part of the person who is under the control of God will allow the converted apostle to return to its original human side.

[Return Through Contact]

 

However,

The note that needs be understood would be that:

What if the [Upper body, dyed in God’s color], and the [Still human, Lower body], whichever if comes in contact with the other, what would be the outcome then…

 

…… Coming in contact with the upper body of Asta sempai is probably a no go.

…… Since, it could happen that, I am judged as being [Contacted], and thus get converted into the God faction, dyed in its color.

 

Since, when a person touches God, (s)he is [Caught].

As long as people are unable to touch God, it becomes understandable that to make an apostle return to being in the original human side, one has to touch the lower, still human body.

 

“Anyways sempai, please spread this rule to our other teammates—–.” (Fei) As fast as possible…

 

From the other side of the building, the roar of God Titan reached their end.

 

“Oh no… Are we going to be again its targets?!” (Asta)

“That Titan’s roar… Isn’t it actually happy?” (Fei)

 

Reche stares at the dust coming from the building which just now collapsed.

 

That voice, it actually tells us that the Titan is actually happy, or so would actually be an illusion Fei’s mental perception is creating for him.

 

Fei was able to understand completely, this God’s mind.

If there is a human present who is worth playing a game with, then even for God, the game would become incredibly merry.

 

“And that is why, we will now be aimed at…, it’s time to run again Reche ~.” (Fei) “Wai!… Wait a bit Fei! Are you planning to leave me behind!?” (Asta)

“Sempai just hide somewhere for now. The God will be aiming at the two of us mainly from now.” (Fei) “If you stay with me, there is a chance that you will get trampled again by one of his legs.” (Fei)

“……Roger That” (Asta)

 

With that..

Asta immediately evacuates into the shadows of the building.

 

She might be safe

at least for now.

 

On the other hand, the crises is imminent for Reche and Fei, who are now specifically targeted by this heartily happy God, Titan.

 

…… The decision of the God, targeting us, is the correct.

…… The moment we, Reche and I understood the rule conditions by which converted pawn-apostles can be reinstated back to their original, human sides.

 

The God cannot let us be.

 

If you get caught by God, you become a pawn of God.

However, if Reche and Fei remains, then whoever, if converted into God’s pawns, they can be reinstated back to original, human side.

 

From the God’s point of view, the moment we, Reche and I are caught; it would mean the same as winning the entire game.

 

Well obviously,

If that is so, he would definitely try to catch us as soon as possible.

 

“Fei, faster. The Titan is closing the distance.” (Reche) “Even if you say so, I am trying my utmost.” (Fei)

 

Even though Reche still have the leeway to look back.

 

But,

For Fei; he doesn’t have the leeway to even answer her questions properly.

 

Even if he runs with all his might,

In the end, he is still a human.

Against a God Titan who is the size of a huge skyscraper, he cannot possibly win in a normal, straightforward chase.

 

“On thinking about the possible speed of the Titan…. wouldn’t it be at least be 900 kmph.” (Reche) “…… And you are telling me to run faster than that?” (Fei) [Tl note: I guess he doesn’t even have the mental strength to respond xD.]

 

Even if Reche has much of a leeway, it is different for my case.

 

Since…

 

Fei’s Divine Curse is of

[Immortality]

 

There is almost no enhancement to the physical capabilities of the body.

So,

 

In a normal race, his speed is similar to that of a normal human being.

 

Thus, if you continue to chase, Fei will eventually be caught.

 

There is need of a Plan IMMIDIATELY.

 

“Should we run within the gulley’s of buildings and make its eyes uncomfortable?” (Fei) “Though if its Reche, she can escape easily leaving me behind. But…” (Fei)

Reche shakes her head.

“It would be meaningless. If we continue to just run away, we can never win against it mon~” (Reche)

“The Terminal spirit also said, remember…” (Reche)

“Even if you continue to run away, you can still lose.” (Reche) “That defeat conditions do make us wonder doesn’t it. First of all, what should we even do to be able to win?” (Reche)

Yes,

The conditions for victory is yet to be solved by them.

 

I cannot yet comprehend the conditions for victory.

 

First of all, the main concern is to be able to run away from this God.

And after that?

 

“Is finding the victory conditions also a part of the game?” (Reche) “…… Defeating the Titan will just make it like a fighting game, so perhaps no.” (Fei) [TL note: Fei intuition?]

“For example: winning after to not getting caught for a certain period of time.” (Reche)

“There is a possibility, but there is no proof to support it.” (Fei) “There is no instance to know for how long one should keep running away. Then…——-” (Fei)

Then, I suddenly saw…

 

Reche, who was running besides is continuously staring at me with a big smile plastered on her face from a while ago.

She looked really, REALLY happy.

 

“ehehehe . ehehe , ehehehehe ~” (Reche)

 

“…… what is it..” (Fei)

“Nope ~, It just that… what I thought… was right ~” (Reche)

This girl, the former God did not even try to hide her grin.

As if telling to keep watching her (grin) smile, bringing her face closer to him while running.

 

“Our conversations match doesn’t it~.. what I want to tell is properly conveyed too. And above all, we are having so much fun! Even though this is just a game.” (Reche)

“? Isn’t it obvious? It’s such a difficult game, that is why.” (Fei)

“That is why I am happy. See, when I was a God, I would be extremely happy to find people take my game, my challenge, that seriously.” (Reche) [TL note: I didn’t know Gods could be this cute…]

 

A Game is something to enjoy.

 

If humans are able to enjoy the games, then even Gods would obviously of feel happy. Reche’s grinning lips conveys the same feelings.

 

“Nevertheless, losing is frustrating, therefore I would like to win ~.” (Reche) “That goes without saying.” (Fei)

 

“But, If we are unable to find the victory conditions for Humans fast, things might turn really bad from now on.” (Reche)

and..

A huge presence is nearing them.

 

One doesn’t even need to look back to understand.

 

Since,

 

The amount of fragmented remnant in the air…

 

Remnants of window glass dust

The concrete dust from the demolished buildings.

 

Those demolished by that God Titan, could be felt by Fei on his back, Clearly

 

Chapter 2.8

 

Translated by: Darkapta

 

 

Those buildings demolished by that God Titan, could be felt by Fei on his back,

Clearly

 

but…

 

…… Wasn’t the obstacle in front of the God Titan meant to be obstacle in the race…

…… Though he is not jumping over it, rather kicking them to pieces…

 

Well yes, it does serve as an obstacle.

 

But

Since the Titan is huge to begin with,

if it does not destroy those building that comes in his way, he won’t be able to catch Reche and Fei.

 

“Well, running in between the gulley of buildings is helping me buy more times at least……” (Fei)

“So to remember, that terminal spirit, Meep, did tell that there are several ways by which the human side could lose, right?” (Fei)

 

Hmm… Let’s sort it out.

 

In this ‘God Pretend’;

There are three deciding (win-lose) conditions and two hidden rules that exists.

 

Those are:

 

[Victory condition]

？？？？？

[Defeat condition 1]

All of you must be caught.

 

[Defeat condition 2]

？？？？？

(You may be defeated even if you manage to escape)

 

[Hidden Rule 1]

Those who are disabled by the God Titan’s attack will have their part of the body dyed in his color, becoming his Pawns.

 

[Hidden Rule 2]

The Apostle-Pawns can return back to the human side if a free Apostle contacts the undyed part of that Titan’s subordinates.

 

So, are there any possibilities that there are other rules in this game?

 

……

 

Obviously, there are..

But the fact that no one is able to grasp those conditions even after so much time playing the game,

Then it would be better to probably think more about it than just ignoring.

 

…… The troublesome rule among them is definitely the second defeat condition.

…… Even if one manages to run away, they can get defeated. This rule cannot be ignored.

 

Fei starts concentrating on his thoughts. And in some moments after…

“Guh. Fei! Bend down!” (Reche)

 

Reche jumped, makes a sharp turn by her legs just like a comma (‘,’) and kicks off the huge ball of steel rubble which flew towards Fei.

Targeting his grey matter (aka brain).

 

“… I’m saved, Thank you Reche. WON’T YOU EVEN GIVE ME A BIT OF (SPARE) TIME TO THINK!?” (Fei) [TL note: the lines in uppercase is dedicated to the God Titan]

 

A ‘snipe’ attack made from a distance, at least a few hundred kilometers away.

 

It was no coincidence. The steel rubble which came towards them was specifically thrown, aimed at Reche and Fei from a far away distance; none other than the God Titan himself.

 

“…It sure does not cut corners…” (Fei) [TL note: ……やるなぁ or …… Yaru na]

A streak of cold sweat drops down the back of Fei.

 

Fei said so while being conscious about the loud reverberating sounds of his heartbeat

Ringing loudly in his ears.

A sense of Bewilderment.

 

“There is still some time left till it catches up to us. It is completely hunting us out.” (Fei)

“Nevertheless, it is also psychologically tiring me out by its long distance ‘snipe’ attacks too.” (Fei)

“…… As I thought, challenging a God will always be tough.” (Fei)

 

The Giant God Titan is not just a Huge bodied brat rampaging…

But a God,

A talented individual at least.

 

The Titan had both the combined properties of wisdom and strength at its disposal. It is a being, very much suitable to be associated among the very construction of ‘God’ as understood by humans.

 

“Fei, now which way?” (Reche)

“A right turn from here…… Ah, let’s rather go to another road in the gulley(s). There are indeed many similar roads.” (Fei)

 

The Sacred City of Ruin has a “grid” structure with evenly spaced streets running horizontally and vertically. [TL : like a chess board?]

 

In addition, even the layout of the buildings is at regular intervals.

 

The scenery is beautiful, but the similarity of the atmosphere makes it easy for anyone to lose track of where one is.

 

“Even though I just came back after just half a year, I still lose my way. Ummmm…… This One! (perhaps)” (Fei)

 

Thus, we run to the back of the building.

 

If one moves in between the buildings, the Titan will not be able to recognize that easily.

 

…… Think! What can be our victory conditions?

…… This is a game is made by such an intelligent God, and the rule too must be quite sophisticated.

 

Then there must be a hint somewhere.

The possibility of us coming across it already very high.

 

“I’m sure there’s been some hints in the situation so far. If we can’t find it, then we are missing it.” (Fei)

 

There is only some time left to think about it.

Since,

Soon The Titan would knock down every building and catch both Reche and Fei.

 

The footstep reverberates…

 

Fei’s ear suddenly catches a presence of someone running on the asphalt road.

 

“What is with these numbers?! No matter how you think about it, isn’t it way too many!?” (Fei)

 

Fei stops in his tracks as his mind turned turmoil.

 

He stops in front of a skyscraper, having the shape of Twin-Tower, for a few seconds. And then appeared… several Apostles from around the corner sprinting towards him.

 

“……Tell me it’s a lie…” (Fei)

 

Those who came were now just Pawns.

Pawns of the God Titan.

 

Having the upper body colored in the same color of that God Titan,

Moreover…

There were 15 of them in total.

 

An overwhelming number difference.

Let alone Fei… Even Reche had a bitter smile plastered on her face.

 

…… Just that, the appearance of Asta sempai was missing, as she went on hiding earlier.

…… In short, everyone except her.

 

Human 3 vs. God 16 (including Titan).

 

While we were being chased by God Titan, The already converted to Pawns, vice-captain and his two aids were busy catching all other apostles into his wing in the meantime.

 

“Um.. Reche, can you break through their defenses from front with brute force?” (Fei)

 

“Can I burn down all those Humans down?” (Reche)

 

“Ah well, Dismissed, No.” (Fei)

 

It is true that injuries in this world does not get reflected in the real world.

Thus, even if Reche exterminate all those fifteen apostles present in front of her, they will probably safely return back to their original world.

Chapter 2.9

Translated By: Darkapta

 

It is true that injuries in this world does not get reflected in the real world.

Thus, even if Reche exterminate all those fifteen apostles present in front of her, they will probably safely return back to their original world.

But…

There was a reason why Fei prohibited her from doing so.

Due to the possibility of defeat condition 2 being, [When the apostle who became God’s place is forcibly dropped by another apostle] cannot be ruled out.

…… “PK”, Player Killer, where an apostle intentionally drops another apostle from the game.

…… That’s also against the purpose of this game, isn’t it?

It’s very likely that a defeat condition trap has been planted as a punishment for those who break it.

Behind them is the God Titan. And in front of them are the fifteen apostles, who are now just pawns under the control of the Titan God.

“I am sorry……” (Captain of the Apostles Group)

Biting his back teeth, the captain of the team blurted out in anguish.

We’ve been wiped out.

“……Well, yeah.. I can see that.” (Fei)

“But don’t try to give up. Even if it just the two of you. Just Escape!” (Captain of the Apostle Group)

“Then please leave us be . don’t catch us .” (Fei)

“My feet, they are moving on their own. They won’t listen to me!” (Captain of the Apostle tGroup)

The Apostle-pawns charge forwards.

Breaking through the defenses of fifteen people will be going to be difficult.

‘…… This way!’ (Fei)

As soon as he gave the signal to Reche by his eyes, Fei started running to the first-floor hall of the department store.

“OKKK, as I thought, the reproduction is exactly same as the original.” (Fei)

From the moment I saw the light there in this building, I kind of had the precognition that so might be it, but to see that even the inner workings are also moving as it does in the real world.

The automatic door, the alarm clock, even the security cameras. All were working as it did in the real world.

“The present location of the elevator is underground level huh. So, stairs it is.” (Fei)

“Fei, the humans are already in the hall you know…” (Reche)

“SO, It WiLl BE The EmeRGenCY StAIRs!” (Fei) (in a flustered manner)

And so…

They open up the emergency door located in the back alley and run up the spiral emergency stairs fast.

Reche and Fei went to the third floor,

The other pawn-apostles, following their footsteps also goes up the building through the same emergency stairs from the very first floor….

But..

“Whoa ~, don’t you think they’re chasing way too?” (Fei) (monotonously)

And then Reche tramples the landing part the stairs as hard as possible,

And,

As the destructive sound echoes.

The overwhelming destructive energy contained in the Dragon God’s feet shattered the pillars supporting the stairs.

As the staircase starts to collapse, the apostles who got caught in that fell down the stairs one after another.

“We can earn several tens of seconds of time at most. Even an apostle, let alone a human, who is now a pawn of a God, they can’t get up from this situation quite easily. Right?” (Reche)

“Yep, very much so. Let’s hurry up.” (Fei)

Thus, they went towards from the fire escape route to the floor of the building.

The third floor, clothes section of the department store.

Reche and Fei were now running around the corner of the children designated clothing section.

“Is this the reason for one of the hidden rule of the game, ‘Becoming a servant of the God’. Even if the huge body of the Titan is unable to go inside the building, if it is a fellow human, (s)he can chase us even inside the buildings too. Moreover…” (Fei)

 

Moreover…

ZUUUNN

The huge vibrations shook the complete building.

The God Titan must be getting quite close.

If that Titan reaches this place, this department store would also be destroyed in just a single one of its blow.

…… We are completely like a rat in a bag na~

…… If we don’t escape this building right now, we will be blown together with this whole building.

But even if we try to escape, those pawn-apostle downstairs will come to interject us. (Fei)

We are now in a condition locked from inside as well as outside the building altogether. (Fei)

Fei, isn’t there another fire escape at the end of this floor? (Reche)

That can be another option. (Fei)

The other option is to break a window and jump out of the building. …… (Fei)

There are still options left for escaping.

However, that would not be enough. If one continues to run away from the oncoming Titan God, one will eventually be stuck forever without knowing the victory condition of the Game.

“ARGH DAMN! These people chasing me are a pain such a pain to deal with, and now there’s even the mystery of the victory condition of this game rules!” (Fei)

I would like to get some help too in the least. …Well, there is also Asta hiding in a building far away. (Reche)

Rachael shrugged her shoulders, smiling slightly.

While winding the flame like colored Vermillion hair on the forehead with her index finger,

she said.

“Anyone and everyone leaving us are already wiped out, It’s already a given. All would eventually turn over to that Titan’s side.” (Reche)

「――――――――」

(Reche & Fei)

To that comment said in a whispering tone, Fei turned towards Reche with his breath halted (unknowingly).

“…… Is that so…” (Fei)

“Fei? Is something wrong?” (Reche)

“No, As you said Reche. They were turned over.” (Fei)

The apostles were captured by the gods.

As a sign of which, their upper half of the bodies are dyed by the same color as that of God Titan.

—- Now I understood the complete context…

The twofold and threefold power addition evil trick of that God…

And also, there was a subtle hidden clue in there which could lead them to victory.

“It is as I thought. It was us who overlooked the conditions for victory right! Reche!” (Fei)

“Hyaaa!?” (Reche)

Getting her shoulders suddenly held made Reche go complete red all over her face for a second. But Fei was unable to realize that. Since, Fei’s head was completely filled with the context of the game. To Win The Game That Is.

“Reche~, this God Pretend is actually a game, which is the combination of Tag (OniGokko) and Hide and Seek.” (Fei)

“……Heee, and?” (Reche)

[TL note: Dense Protag?, let’s see some more before giving the Tag :p]

……

 

“That was the Biggest illusion of this game for us.” (Fei)

God has never said that this game is “Tag”.

“God Pretend is the combination of Tag and Hide and Seek, a completely another game than those to begin with. This explains why there were two conditions of defeat in this game.” (Fei)

The condition for victory is only one. But for defeat, two. All these twisted rules now make complete sense.

“Reche, lend me your ears.” (Fei)

“Li… Like this?” (Reche)

She brings her ears close to the human’s mouth. But that act was unfamiliar for Reche, to begin with…

and therefore…

She was indeed quite sensitive…

—–

“Awa…. Ahnnnnn… Uhnnn… ehehe” (Reche)

Suddenly spouted out her mouth innocently.

“Is something wrong?” (Fei)

“You… your breath… It tickles!” (Reche)

“Stop it! it’s confusing!……” (Fei)

“Well, the fact that you are also taking this easy is kind of reassuring too.” (Fei)

“Don’t worry, You can leave everything to me.” (Reche)

*pon

Reche’s hand touched Fei’s shoulders.

“Let’s divide then. I just have to attract half of those pawn-apostles towards me right?” (Reche)

“Yup, let’s divide them into two groups. From now, we will go in different ways.” (Fei)

 

Chapter 2.10

Translated By: Darkapta

 

“Let’s divide then. I just have to attract half of those pawn-apostles towards me right?” (Reche)

“Yup, let’s divide them into two groups. From now, we will go in different ways.” (Fei)

“I will take the outside.” (Reche)

“I will go up then.” (Fei)

Nodding in unison,
 They kicked the floor as if going on with their constructed game plan.

Reche went outside the building breaking through the building glass.

 

There were in total 15 apostles outside.

When they understood that Fei and Reche separated; just as Fei calculated, one half of the group went outside following towards Reche, to catch her.

“…… C’MON MAKE ITTT!” (Fei)

Fei didn’t even have the luxury to send Reche off.

Fei, who remained in the building, took the other emergency stairs located in the far back.

Even when he is doing so, the footsteps of the Titan, caused the whole department building to vibrate, a sign, that the Titan was dangerously closing in.

“Even the pawn-apostles. Since they went downstairs following me before, they will definitely coming upstairs too.” (Fei)

Fei continues to run upstairs.

As he continues to climb the stairs, the sound of building getting destroyed reverberates in his ears.

The Titan had must have destroyed some nearby buildings one after another.

…… Did he think that after Reche, even I would try to escape from this place?

…… First is to sever my escape routes heh. Truly flawless.

The Titan continues to destroy all the surrounding buildings, and then, by finally destroying this apartment building, it would be a sure shot win for the Titan.

It’s the best modus operandi. [TL note: modus operandi – course of action]

It’s a frustratingly perfect procedure that even Fei would have followed if he were in the place of the God Titan.

“Please!, make it in time! Reche!” (Fei)

Just a bit more, and we will be able to give ‘that’ a befitting reply.

“LIKE I SAID… I’M HERE!” (Fei)

On This Roof —-

Fei kicked open the hot thick terrace door and jumped outside,

Greeted by those strong surrounding winds.

If he was here,

the pawn-apostles; even if they start climbing now, they would surely take some time to climb up completely.

Till they, the pawn-apostles, come up, I can earn some time (for Reche and Asta).

Was the ephemeral desire of a human like Fei.

『――――――』

“What Th!?” (Fei)

But alas.

Even that fragile desire of the human would erase in the eyes of the God, and its anticipating appearance.

The height of the rooftop, the position of Titan’s head, his eyes staring at Fei, and Fei’s own eyes staring back at him;

All were almost perfectly aligned.

There…

The gaze of a single human, and a God intersects each other.

“Was I induced?!” (Fei)

Yes…

There, God was waiting, patiently, for his appearance.

Using the apostles, who were now his subordinates. To entice the last remaining human in that building outside, to the roof of the building.

The God Titan can finally and surely take them all down completely now.

Thus, Winning the Game…

Fei is alone on the roof top;

It would not matter where Reche is at present.

Since, if one is unable to run anywhere, there will be the end of the game for that one.

The Titan God raised his Fist to the Skies, pointing towards the Heavens

and then…

The Fist of God.

Drops down

Succeeding it was the complete destruction of the department store building.

The humans were just like poppy grains in front of that fist, as they disappeared with the department building.

As per the rules of God-Pretend, the humans who are incapacitated are not dropped out of the game. But rather converted, into being a pawn of the God.

As it’s subordinate, in it’s complete control.

And with this…

The Game comes to an end……


“With the destruction of all the buildings, the game comes to an end. Right~” (Fei)

!?

[TL note: The sound made is kind of like TsuTsu!? Or ZuZu!?]

The God Titan was perplexed.

Up till now, all humans who were thrown-out by its fist, were all burned up.

The Titan looks up at the clouds.

There, Fei’s body was enveloped in bright red flames, beginning to be reborn, revive from death.

 

The divine blessing/curse, ‘Arise’ received by Fei from the Gods, which made him an apostle…

was ——-

– Superhuman Type –

[Classified]

“The Receiver of God’s Utmost Grace”

 

From scratches to fatal wounds, malice, curse, destiny…

Whatever done by any God or anyone… all are rendered equally useless, restoring Fei to his original condition.

 

The Ultimate Form Of Rejuvenation.

Thus, even if under the rules of this game, God-Pretend; When Fei became incapacitated, He did not convert into being a subordinate, a pawn in control of the God Titan.

The ignorance of this ability of Fei was a calculation miss in case of the God Titan.

The only variable which came in front of its complete victory.

“Ita ta  ta, always hitting with all your might… the pain sensation does not get nullified too you know……” (Fei)

Fei wipes off the blood covering his eyes with his hands.

From up above, The Heavens which even looked onto the God Titan. Fei was there, looking down upon the ground from up above.

Witnessing the vast field,

The made-up city of Ruin, inhabiting the game: God-Pretend; Where now no buildings left anymore… all disappeared.

 

Chapter 2.11

Translated By: Darkapta

 

“Even if I revive, Did you think that you have won by a ratio of 16:3?” (Fei) [TL note: Titan 16; Human 3]

“But unfortunately, it’s the opposite.” (Fei)

“The condition of victory is actually met by us; ISN’T IT RIGHT —GOD!” (Fei)

“HMM!?”

“Now, its time to discuss answers. The rule that was kept hidden till the very end of this game God-Pretend is…” (Fei)

Pointing underneath the eyes of the God Titan…

“Reversi (Othello) right ~” (Fei)

 

God-Pretend……

[TL note: Kami-Gokko; similar to Oni-Gokka, well known as Tag]

From the name itself, people are psychologically allowed to think of the game is similar to Tag, a trap encased from the very name of the game.

We were also under the illusion that it was necessary to play hide and seek to avoid detection.

But the essence of the game lied somewhere else.

“The God was chasing, while the humans, fleeing. When humans get converted over to the God’s side, other humans try and rescue them. But this was then similar to a game using hands… where God’s moves first and then Humans next.” (Fei)

 

『――――』

“And the upper body of the human under God, changing into God’s color, quite similar to half of the piece when turned over, changing to another color; the biggest give away.” (Fei)

(1) The turn system of the first move and the second move.

(2) When a piece is turned over to the enemy side, only one side changes to the enemy’s color.

At this point, we can indefinitely tell:

It is a game called Reversi, another name for Othello.

“In other words, the first move is by the Black, while the next is by white. The side with greater numbers of pieces at the end of the game would win. And on top of that—” (Fei)

“The ‘board’ of this game is this whole city right?” (Fei)

The Giant God looks down upon the ground.
