With one leg’s knee raised, and the other crossed with its foot in between the gap. [TL note: an image beneath for clarification]

…now let’s think about it. If the first hidden rule asks to attack the tail of God.

…… then of course, the second Hidden rule would be something related to this course of action.

Hidden Rule 2──

““When rule 1 is achieved, you will be able to ■■■■■■■■■■”

but the question is what will we be “will be able to ……”

on top of this God’s back ──

We are definitely now able to do something now.

“For example, if our “arise”, God’s blessing/curse is strengthened and now if we attack God with that power, will it be effective? What do you think, Reche.”

“If so, then the most probable person who is affected by it would definitely be Pearl right. Here~ here~ come over here~”

“ah, yes! What is it, Reche san?”

Listening to the murmur of Reche, the blonde-haired girl raised her face vigorously, in reaction.

“Do you need something from me?”

“That I am going to find out just now.”

Reche moved almost instantly.

And held Pearl’s face with both her hands and gently pinched her cheek.

It’s a good idea to take a look at it. Like~

*sfx Puni-puni

To get just the right feeling of that she kept on squeezing it, holding and releasing it.

“Mumumu. Even though you are in this spiritual upper realm, the feel is just about right. The skin is still chewy and has enough buoyancy, the surface too feels moist and well hydrated.”

“……Ah, what are you doing continuously squeezing my cheeks?”

“The best gameplay is achieved with the best physical condition. From the moist and soft feel of your skin, I can guess that today your physical condition is a ……pass!

You pass the ordeal, Pearl, please continue to work hard and master the path of gaming in the future that is to come!”

“………… ummmm.”

“However, there is no change it seems.”

Reche said so with a serious look after taking away her hand from Pearl’s cheek.

“Because it was Pearl that achieved the criteria for the “hidden rule 1”, I wonder if there will be any visible change regarding you.”

“? what do you mean?”

“As Fei said, attacking God’s tail and receiving a counterattack should be the right route. Then accordingly, the next is “When rule 1 is achieved, you will be able to ■■■■■■■■■■” So, shouldn’t you be “able to do” something?”

“……Even if you say so.”

Pearl gestures, staring at her palm intently.

“There doesn’t seem to be any change with me though ……”

“Check it out carefully. Like being able to suddenly fly in the sky or being able to run 300 kms per hour. Even if it is being able to take a nap of 15 mins and be completely refreshed; anything, just see for that some change.”

“That last one completely sounded perfunctory!?”.

[Tl note: Perfunctory meaning half-hearted]

“So, is there any change?”

 “There is none.”

While looking at the exchange between both of them “Pearl, then let’s try out your skills/abilities as a test.”

 

Looking up at the blonde girl from his seated position, Fei pointed down towards her foot.

Towards the back of this God.

“Now, using the same strength with which you hit that wall-like tail, try hitting this God’s back. You can even kick it if you like.”

 “…… yes?”

 “As a reward for completing Hidden Rule 1, we may be allowed to inflict damage to this God. And so, if we are then able to get him to say, “it hurts” with this – we win in the process.”

“Oh! That really sounds like it’s possible!”

 Pearl bowed down.

 

She tightens her expression and slowly clenches her fists.

“Please overlook me, Fei san, This Pearl, this time will definitely succeed in defeating this God!”

“Break a leg. The probability of this time is surely high.”

“Haaa!”

 *sfx mishi

As a result of hitting against a scale harder than steel with her fists, Pearl’s wrist rang out with an unpleasant sound.

“────”

And as one continues to look at that face, it transforms into a blue hue.”

“IT HURTS!?”

 

 “Aaah, so that’s also a dud. I thought I had at least a 0.2 percent chance of success this time, but I guess it won’t allow us to successfully conquer him that easily huh.”

“IT WAS ONLY MY HANDS TURNING RED THOUGH!?”

Chapter 4.11

 

Translated by: Darkapta
 Edited by: Hinagiku

 

 

“Well, you did hit the hard scales with all your might, so it can’t be helped if it swells.”

“But at least warn me in the beginning!”

“You do remember how I got hurt after I kicked these hard scales earlier right~. Anyway, with this, we are a step further, we just need to think more.”

 

Sitting down, Fei closed his eyes on that spot.

 “…… What are you doing?”

 “Thinking. I’m tired of looking at this sea of clouds, and I thought it would be a nice change of pace to close my eyes for the time being.”

Hidden Rule 1: When you attack the tail of the Ouroboros, it counterattacks.

Hidden Rule 2 – When you achieve 1, you will be able to ■■■■■■ for a certain amount of time.

What will we “be able to”?

The most likely answer was “can attack” the god. I thought it would be a victory if Pearl’s attack reached him and made him say “it hurts”.

…… Even though Pear hits it, The God is unharmed.

…… That would mean that the “can do” in hidden rule 2 signifies a completely different thing.

Although, I can’t find anything that can fit the bill.

 

The God of infinite – Ouroboros just wanders endlessly through the sea of clouds. This Gods’ Playground is just a sea of clouds as far as the eyes can perceive, with sky whales swimming in it.

…… First of all, “Only for a certain amount of time” is really strange to begin with.

……Why does it have a time limit in the first place?

 

Think about it.

He shuts his eyelids and focuses on only his thoughts. [Tl note: mind palace?]

…… What does God want us to do, by inviting humans into this playground?

…… What is that one other choice we are yet to try?

We’ve walked this far on God’s back. We have attacked its tail and got hit back too.

What else is there to try?

 

What other choices are left for the human beings who are being carried around on God’s back?

 

I continue to search in my thoughts.

Finding new options and eliminating them if useless. I don’t even know how much time has passed by. I closed my eyes and just kept on searching around my head, from one thought to another, from one possibility to another as fast as I could.

After all that. There was only one left.

There was only one possibility that kept lingering in Fei’s mind, uneliminated.

 

“What if…?”

As he was about to open his mouth and say out his conjecture, someone beat him to that.

“……, Argh I quit.”

A murmur

The members of the Flame Blossom buzzed at the muttered words of this certain male apostle sighed out.

“Do you call this a game!? Isn’t it just a one-sided game which plays with the feelings of the humans and slaughters them completely ……”

“I think so too.”

Yet another girl apostle added.

 “Captain, ten hours have passed since we entered this space. We’ve already surpassed the average time it takes to play a game with the gods ……, and we’ve only made sacrifices till now …….”

“I agree with you. I don’t think we can make any more progress than this.”

“Captain, isn’t it about time to consider surrendering ……”

The silence was broken.

Considering how unreasonable this game was, his mental strength must have reached its limit against it.

“Captain!”

“B—But ……”

Being glared at by his subordinates, Captain Ovan’s could only undesirably screech his teeth.

A few of his men behind him ── yes, there were also members with “Two defeats” already marked by their names.

An apostle loses their qualification for playing against the gods’ after going through “three defeats”. If that does happen, then they will have to retire. Moreover, the captain himself has already registered two defeats to himself and thus has no other option.

Surrendering here would be similar to committing a suicide.

“Why—why …… do we have to be put against this god ……?”

One of the apostles said so, biting his lip.

Why do we have to be this unlucky?

Even though they are wishing to conquer this game of God. They have to encounter and experience the despair of playing against an undefeated god heh?

And thus, this frustration then leads to: ────

Making someone hold responsibility.

Which again from time on time is pushed to the weak individuals, who are held responsible through the use of “diversion”.

“If only we hadn’t lost that one.”

A whisper.

The one to whom the gaze was directed towards by the members of the Flame Blossom was the former teammate ── Pearl.

“Because of that somebody, who pulled our legs from that victory, about half a year ago.”

“If it weren’t for that annihilation, I’d still have only one loss registered to my name. If I hadn’t lost there, I would have been able to afford to lose to Ouroboros here today.”

“…… Ah, …… no, I’m not! …… that’s not …… that’s not what I wanted……”

“If we apologize, will it undo our loss?”

 “u!”

Pearl gulped.

bathed in the stinging words from her former teammate. A shadow falls on her expression.

“Even drawing out the game for Ouroboros is probably also a curse from someone. Why does she always come back to bite us on our back?”

“…………”

Not even a word could form.

Even if she were to talk back here, she would’ve only just poured oil on the fire. Since she knew it, Pearl shifts her eyes away and just silently withstands it.

And precisely because there is no rebuttal from Pearl, their cussing just kept on increasing.

“I was only because of you.”

“────────── Shut up.”

And everything along with that.

As if being kicked by the spirit of the voice from that former god, everyone stood silent in their place.

“For a while looking at you all”

There, where once stood the appearance of a lovely girl was as if been never there.

 

In her place was standing a “God” who would not allow anyone to stare back at its gaze as it kept glaring at the members of the Flame Blossom. With its eyes. The eyes of a dragon. and surrounding her whole body, was a flame of the same colour as the hair, a colour like that of a flame lamp burning brightly, starting to rise up faintly.

Probably ──

If someone were to touch those flames or even its sparks, they would turn into cinders without any discrimination, no matter how powerful the apostle was or is.

Chapter 4.12

 

Translated by: Darkapta
 Edited by: Hinagiku

 

 

“You punks… do you enjoy pushing this girl to the corner so very enjoying for your minds heh?”

“!”

The members of Flame Blossom gulp their breath.

“You’re an eyesore. If you are so disgusted by her, cramp out of here. This me, I can return you all punks to your real world if you so desire like it.

“……… U……Guh!?”

“So, What would it be?”

“Wait a bit! Isn’t it cowardly for a former God to stand up and protect a human being such as her so dearly!”

One still blew it out.

One of such apostles with such a bitter smile on his face pointed at Pearl.

“The relationship between “us” and Pearl should be none of your business. “

 

“Even though it’s the truth that because of that Pearl over there, we all were wiped out!”

“…………”

“Covering up for such a person is unnatural to be ──”

“Baka.”

The response from Reche came along with an exasperated sigh.

 

“Ha-, Ah whatever. Your reasoning was so out of context, that I lost the energy to stay angry.”

Her voice and eyes returned to normal.

Even the sparking flames that were covering the whole body subsided along with the anger which was coming from Reche.

“I hope you don’t get the wrong idea over here; Pearl is not yet a part of a team with me yet, and there are no feelings for her whatsoever. First of all”

Then pointing towards Pearl, who was still puzzled.

“Take a good look at this person.”

“……Me?”

“I would never ever protect/cover-up for a girl with b*****s bigger than that of mine ever!”

“THE SIZE OF MY B*****S HAS GOT NOTHING TO DO WITH THIS!?”

“If you make her buck naked, it’s even more amazing. This girl is hiding some real treasury under those clothes I tell you that.”

“STOP STOP STOP IIITTT!”

“──I’m telling you all to shut up because you’re coming in between the way of this game.”

Reche combs her flame-like hair with her fingertips.

“I can’t care less about the feud between Pearl and the Light of Flame Blossom. I was angry at you all because of your attitude, bringing in unneeded emotions into this game and in turn ruining it’s ambience/sanctity for those taking and playing this game seriously.”

“…………”

“It’s such an exciting game, so why don’t you all have more fun with it?”

“……It’s fun?”

The apostles’ mouths were half open, as if they were doubting their ears which listened to those words.

“This being fun is absolutely a lie, a hoax. Because we do not understand or even have the slightest clue or even hint on how to go on with capturing this you know. Rather, aren’t we having our people taken out, and disqualified one-sidedly!”

“Is that so?”

“Ah yeah it is so, just who in this place, apart from you, do you think is yet to give up ……”

“There is one, don’t you think too?”

Reche nodded with full confidence. As if she were waiting to be asked this very question from the very beginning.

“I know, there is one more person who really loves this game apart from me. Right Fei~?”

“…… Gimme a bit more time.”

Sitting on the back of this God ──

Fei, who had his eyes closed on that spot, opened one of them responding to Reche’s words.

He was completely silent about Pearl being ridiculed and bullied by the members of the Flame Blossom, was not because he was hesitating to enter in between them in any way.

I just couldn’t hear them.

He cut off all the outer information exchange in his body. He dedicated in using all of his conscience for deciphering, for the pursuit of this game alone.

“In just some more time, I will be finally able to (understand it)/(get it).

He looks up.

Staring at the tail of the God with undivided attention, without even blinking, standing tall in front of him.

……Yes, as I thought, it is this very tail that should be focused upon after all.

……I knew there would be a mechanism to counterattack, although there remains one more question.

That light-ray was just too powerful.

Apart from me and Reche, everyone would just “Died Instantly”. Given that even those Superhumans and Supernatural Humans who got their blessing/curse from the Gods were unable to withstand the degree of its power, there is a degree to even massacre and overkill.

So as I understand, it is something like firing a cannon while aiming for the home bug kind of thing perhaps.

And when you think from an opposite angle ──

“If there is any other meaning to that humongous Light-cannon than causing wide scale massacre, then it would probably be?”

The Light cannon burned up and penetrated the four apostles. And other that is this clear blue sky and an endless sea of clouds.

“………… Now I see.”

He clenches his fists tight.
 

Chapter 4.13

 

Translated by: Darkapta
 Edited by: Hinagiku

 

 

Previous:
 The Light cannon burned up and penetrated the four apostles. And other that is this clear blue sky and an endless sea of clouds.

“………… Now I see.”

He clenches his fists tight.

 

As if nodding in accordance; Fei stood up.

“What is the matter, Fei san? All of a sudden?”

Without answering Pearl’s question, Fei put his attention towards the members of the Blazing Flower members who still had a hard expression on their face.

“Captain, let me apologize beforehand. Probably, there will be more sacrifices.”

“……What?”

Then, facing Captain Ovan once again, Fei released all his breath in one go.

“LET’S MAKE THE GOD ANGRY AGAIN.”

“HAVE YOU LOST YOUR MIND?”

“On the contrary, we are definitely going to win. That is why, I want everyone to spectate the live game – till the last minute. We will definitely win, with me Reche and –”

“What do you mean!”

“Oi Fei!”

Facing the girl with flame-like hair, Fei told in a loud voice.
 His fingers pointing towards the tail of the God which was colored Silver— “We got to do it once again! Hit it with all you have in you!”

“Hit, hit what—”

“Like as explosion *dokaan, okay!”

With her eyes glistening with excitement, Reche punched hard dedicated towards the tail of the God.

*sfx Shogeki

Getting hit by the fists of Reche, the back of the God trembled hard.

The light which originated due to that was perhaps a few millions times more-brighter and more-stronger than the time when Pearl hit it.

The whole arena was covered in its color.

And in the very next moment.

Countless of plasma rays or Rather, a giant beam of plasma spread out from that tail to its surroundings.

—God’s Counterattack

Evaporating the Apostles from the team Light of the Flame Blossom in an instant, and more so, piercing into the endless sea of clouds, penetrating, and killing even the sky whales who were swimming in there.

The only ones remaining were the three —

The perpetrator of the whole incident and — Fei and Pearl, being protected by Reche; Them only.

“What.., what the heck are you…”

“As I thought so.”

Next to the shrieking Pearl, Fei was the witness seeing the change that was happening around him.

“Pearl, Look over there, the severed horizon in that endless sea of clouds.”

“Wha..! Bu..? Why!”

The blond-haired girl shifted her eye-line.

With the face that expresses her disbelief, with a shaky voice riddled in astonishment.

“Why are those sky whales trying to attack Ouroboros!?”

Yes.

The sky whales that emerged from the dimension in the sea of clouds were attacking the god (Ouroboros) one after another. Even though after being bitten by them, the god was unharmed, the heavenly whales continue their attack with bloodshot eyes.

“Even though they were supposed to be under the supervision of God……”

“Oh, Yeah, that’s exactly so.”

Well, it was actually Reche who struck the rod.

“These were Neutral monsters weren’t they?”

A third party, who is not sided to the Gods, nor to the Humans.

They were not following its commandments.

The God and the sky whales were just co-existing with each other, nothing more nothing less.

“Eh? Bu..But that is kind of……”

“That is why I told you, didn’t I? Don’t rely on the previous accounts for our Game with God. For the game, we have no choice other than to verify each and everything possible every time, on our own.”

On the other hand, Fei himself; the trembling of his whole body and the excitement of the inner heart just does not seem to stop.

“Hey, Pearl. The God never said a word that the sky whale was under his command did he?”

“……Ah!?”

The previous apostles, seeing the sky whales swimming along with the God in this sea of clouds thought them to be under its command.

But it was wrong. The reason why the sky whales attacked humans when they fell into the sea of clouds was purely because they thought that the humans were invading their own designated territory. Only because of that.

And now the scenario is completely opposite ──

Being attacked by that Plasma Beam of God, the sky whales recognized God as their enemy.

“Until moments ago, we didn’t manage to notice that. First of all, we were completely panicked due to that Plasma Beam and furthermore, due to not seeing anything other than the losses faced by the team Flame Blossom.”

“……Tha—that’s certainly true…”

Pearl bites her lips.

She somehow noticed. How Fei took on the role of being resented, by his own choice.

“If we induce God to fire that beam yet again, there will definitely be losses…… yet someone has to do it, nevertheless. That’s why Fei-san took that role……”

“That’s all fine.”

Tapping on Pearl’s shoulder, Fei pointed out towards those sky whale swimming in the sea of clouds.

“That sky whale are roughly twenty meters away. It’s your turn at last.”

“Wha—what turn?”

“Do you know the saying: ‘The enemy of your enemy is your friend’?

And so, that’s how it is, we will be teleporting on top of them!”

“WAI—WAIT───!?」

Holding Pearl’s hand, Fei began to run on Ouroboros’ back with all his might.

As if jumping off a cliff, Pearl with the two other people leaped out from the back of God. Of course, there is nothing under it, just an endless sea of clouds continuing endlessly.

“Pearl, it’s the time to show what you are capable of!”

“You’re so absurd!…… “A whimsical traveler” ready to activate it!”

The moment Pearl cried out, a golden ring appeared out of the void.

Instant transition – Create transition gates A and B at any point within a radius of thirty meters. Transfer those who pass through A to point B.

A will be in front of Fei and me.

And B, on the back of one of those sky whales.

“Going to teleport!”

Our vision got blurred.

After a moment’s time, Fei and Pearl was now on the back of one of the sky whales, teleported there. However, due to moving violently, the ground under which the foots rest was not as stable as that of the God.

Chapter 4.14

 

Translated by: Darkapta
 Edited by: Hinagiku

 

 

“Wawawa, I’ll fall!, I’m falling!?”

“Hold on tight and wait. It’ll get even more intense now on, Reche!”

“Thank you for waiting~”

And Reche had arrived and landed on top of another sky whale.

Without any teleportation or so, she just went on hopping all of twenty meters and arrived at her destination.

“Fei-san! The God is!”

“Ah! At long last eh…”

An irregularity occurred.

As soon as Fei and his companions jumped out of the God onto one of the sky whales, the God, who was until now as immobile as a mountain, had now begun to turn its way towards us.

[TL note: 旋回を始めたのだ]

And started its move.

This is what the gods was telling us,

That this is the correct way to attack.

“…… amazing. Fei-san, you’re really amazing!”

Pearl shuddered at the sight she saw.

With a voice unable to control her excitement and elated feeling: “We were able to solve the puzzle of that God of Infinite Ouroboros right!”

Game content “Forbidden Word”.

【Victory Condition】

To make Ouroboros say “It hurts”

【Defeat condition】

 All participants drop out

【Hidden Rule 1】

 By attacking Ouroboros’ tail, a counterattack will occur.

[Hidden Rule 2]

When you achieve Rule 1, you will be able to control the sky whale only for a certain period of time.

“To be able to come this far in the capture of this game. It is without a doubt that we are the first in the entire world to be able to do that!”

“Yeah. But being impressed has to wait for later.”

The God moves, and the sky whales rid by Fei and his companions chase it frivolously. It was as if a car chase with the Sea of clouds made the ground for it.

“So at last the prelude is probably finally accomplished huh?”

“Prelude!? Even after doing this much, do we still have to do something more than this yet!?”

“How to make it say, “it hurts?”

“Ah……” Pearl gulped her breath.

That’s right. Even after all this capture procedure accomplished, the final proceedings for the game of the God of Infinite is still not within their sight.

1: Withstand free fall from an altitude of seven hundred meters.

2: The back is useless no matter how much attack.

3: Discover the counterattack system of Ouroboros’ tail.

4: Realize that Ouroboros’ tail counterattack system is not a “trap”.

5: In the counterattack, the sky whale swimming in the sky is winded up.

6: The angry sky whales would now go on to attack the god.

7: This heavenly whale is not a companion of God, but a 3rd party, neutral monster. (This was especially important to notice) 8: Jump on one of the sky whales in the sky to “fight alongside”.

Even so far, humanity was yet to reach.

But still, this was just the preliminary. This god called Ouroboros; just how difficult a game did it prepare for humankind.

“It seems fun……”

“It’s the best.”

While chasing Ouroboros swimming in the sea of clouds.

Fei nodded to the Pearl sitting next to him.

“Weren’t you able to understand, Pearl? Even if it is a game played against God. No matter how many times you play or what record it holds. It is not impossible to win. This game is also the same. The clues are cleverly hidden, but if you observe carefully, the strategy with which you should proceed with, can be understood. It’s a perfectly calculated puzzle-solving game. In other words, ── “

“It will make you enjoy it even more from here on.”

On top of the other sky whale gliding next to him, Reche said so, giving them a wink.

“First of all, We should be looking for its real weakness. If that flashy tail is a gimmick for this, then it’s as if saying that there’s another weakness.”

“Ahhh. But then where to look though.”

“Of course, from the most suspicious place, there is.”

As Reche nodded to that, the sky whales slowly lowered their altitude in the sky.

“There is a proverb in human language which says, “You can’t solve a problem without making some” don’t you?”

“Where we were was the God’s back. Then will it be perhaps the stomach on its opposite end.”

“Let’s Go; to the place underneath God.”

Towards the lower side of the sea of clouds.

Moving underneath through the clouds, that were so thick that they could barely breathe, Fei looked up at the floating infinity god Ouroboros from below, when their eyes widened in unison.

“THE EYES! Right over there ……, there are two bright red eyes right over there!”

Pearl – pointing above her head, screamed out in a hushed voice.

The Eye of Ouroboros.

If one were to explain in the terms of the real world. It can be called the most massive “jewel” article in the world. Two huge red jade-coloured spheres existed in the place of the belly-button of the god.

 

We were able to determine that they were “eyes” because when sky whales that Fei and the others were riding approached it, these huge red jade-like spheres jiggled.

It was keeping a watch on us.

It was observing the whole thing as the humans were approaching it.

 

“……, so, we’re finally meeting face-to-face heh.”

From the moment our eyes met, my throat was becoming thirsty from the sheer inexplicable pressure it exerted.

 

Humans are, from whichever way you look, a being of another dimension.

While that was now releasing a hostility towards them, which by no means was meant to keep hidden in any way.

“Fei san! Tha—that sky whale… don’t you think they are getting close, aiming for that eye!?”

“I think you should aim for the eye. This time, I am sure I am not wrong.”

It was as if a

Revelation from God.

This was the reason why hundreds of sky whales had been placed in the endless sea of clouds. All were done to lead them to God’s weak point.

 

“Well, then~, ……, here we go!”

“Ah. In order to make Ouroboros speak “it hurts”, you have to break that flashy eye altogether.”

Chapter 4.15

 

Translated by: Darkapta
 Edited by: Hinagiku

 

 

Dozens of sky whales flock together like migratory birds.

As they circled at high speed, they gradually closed the distance to Ouroboros’ eye. Then it gained momentum and rose in a straight line to the crimson crystal eye.

“I—its brigh—bright. ……”

“Oh damn, STOP!”

 

It was at that moment that the light cannon flashed out.

There were two bright red eyes. When each of them started to shine as bright as the sun, and at the same time, Fei commanded his sky whale, which they were riding.

A flash of light-cannon.

As a crimson flash shone out from the pair of red eyes, it penetrated through the azure sky in its way.

A few of the approaching sky whales were vaporized at once, and a few of the whales in the aftermath were knocked away and dropped below the sky.

All this happened in front of Fei.

“H—how—how could this…!?”

“Well obviously it won’t let us win so easily. Those two eyes, both of which are defence systems. They’re defending each other.”

If the enemy approaches the right eye, the left eye intercepts.

The enemy approaches the left eye, the right eye will intercept.

“Reche, how is it at your end?”

“N-……It’s no good even if I go around it also. The eyes are sensing everything properly.”

Reche, who tried to approach from the shadow of the giant body of Ouroboros from a position away from Fei and Pearl’s sky whale, hurried up retreating.

“Moreover, it seems to be a huge pain even after I get close to them.”

What Reche was pointing at was the other sky whales that try to go attack going towards the eyes to attack.

The two eyes weren’t able to keep up with the approaching whales from three directions. One of them slipped through the crimson flash and hit the right eye.

While another two bites into the left eye.

 

But it was of no use.

No matter how many times the sky whale attacked the eye, which was supposed to be its weak point, it didn’t even put a scratch on them, the eyes remaining completely unharmed.

“Somehow the difficulty seems to be competitively high…” seeing the abnormal scenery above him Fei exhaled out an amount of breath.

“What do we do Fei san? Both of our divine curses are not suitable for attacking purposes, we have to leave it all to Reche san!.”

“It is not as simple as to leave it all to Reche. We need to find a way with which God’s eyes doesn’t find us.”

“……Do you have a method in hand?”

“No well…, it’s not like I don’t have any.”

While putting pressure down his back teeth…

Only one. With the means of needle-like precision, achieving this through near-miraculous timing.

…… But this strategy, it’s probability to fail is terribly high.

And if …… it fails, the three of us will be happily wiped out altogether.

Any other means?

Don’t panic, there will always be an optimal solution.

As Fei told these words to himself as if trying to deceive and calm down, the sky whale carrying them roared out suddenly. Like a rampaging horse, it swings his body in all directions.

“T—they don’t seem to listen to me anymore! Fei san! isn’t it the so-called “fixed time” that is mentioned in the rules!? That hidden rule number two, …….”

 

“And at this time it runs out like this!”

As the usage time expires. As the third party who does not belong to God’s or human’s side, if they return to being a neutral monster all over again, we will all surely be thrown out into the sky.

There is no more time left anymore.

“Fei, I’m going in first.”

It was Reche who made the decision first.

 

She kicked the head of a sky whale into the air. Then, one after another, she went to another sky whale.

She was like climbing a staircase in the sky. Using the sky whale as a stepping stone and jumping over it, dodging those Light cannons beams as she made her way to that eye.

“Ah damnit, there is no time to ponder anymore. Let’s do it, Pearl.”

“What are we going to do!?”

“Listen very carefully. ─────────────”

Their last strategy.

In a time without even a second delay, the few words that Fei said to Pearl were drowned out by the roars of the sky whales who started regaining their senses.

 “Are you serious?”

“We got to do it or it’ll be hopeless. Also, with the perfect timing. It’s because we are dealing with a party, an opponent like this anyway.”

Even if you use all your wits and skills, it still won’t be enough.

This is the kind of opponent we are dealing with.

 “God smiles on those who reveal miracles to him. Right, God!”

This…

This is the final forty seconds that will separate the winner from the loser.

This is the penultimate!

 

Getting hold of the revolting head of those sky whales, Fei screamed in a strained voice.

“Ascend! Up!”

“!”

Those sky whales stopped their movements with a jerk.

“I only need forty more seconds. Fight with me, you also want to give that god a run for it right!”

The wings of the sky whales flapped.

 

With Fei and Pearl put on its head, that sky whale, gathering up with the others still alive, proceeds towards the eye of God, gaining altitude.

 

“Yes, higher!”

 

All I could hear was the sound of the wind.

With the sound and the gust of wind roaring along through my body, I ascended straight-head-on aiming towards God.

But of course, the God’s eye senses it.

“Fei, it’s starting to shine yet again. That Light cannon!”

“Pearl, I leave the sky whale in your hands!”

A sign of incoming attack.

 

As soon as Fei saw it, he kicked the sky whale and jumped up. He clung onto the sky whale that was gliding right above him, and then jumped to yet another sky whale.

Chapter 4.16

 

Translated by: Darkapta
 Edited by: Hinagiku

 

 

The “right eye” of God.

The light cannon from it did not burn Pearl, but the sky whale to which Fei had jumped onto.

…… It was, I thought. The God’s defence functionalities attack in order of the closeness from its eyes.

…… moreover, prioritizing humans over sky whales.

The closest one to that eye was Fei.

Because he was able to predict that he would be targeted, Fei avoided that shot by a hair-breadth and jumped further onto the next, another the sky whale.

Following that, came the shot from God’s “left eye”.

The left eye, sensing that the interception by the right eye was a failure, accordingly, looked down onto his direction.

The second shot is incoming.

If it manages to shoot, it probably can’t be avoided the next time. While cold sweat spouts in from the pressure that seems to freeze to the pith of the bone, what Fei was looking up towards was a girl with flame-coloured hair.

“I’ve pulled it attention towards me”

“Yeap all’s looking good”

Reche, who jumped off at the very final instance, arrived next to the eye of God.

Using Fei as a decoy.

──Dodging the Light Cannon which came from the right eye.

──While letting the perception of the left eye towards her.

Just a few seconds. The minute gap which Fei made for her; Reche clenches her fists aiming at the defenceless right eye of the God.

“Well then, without much further ado!”

The Fist of Tyranny.

A fist of power equal to that of a falling giant meteorite pierced onto the red coloured ball.

*sfx gunyari~.

“Wha!?”

What Reche’s fist, felt was an overwhelming “impossible resistance”.

Mode change ── The Red jade crystal went through semi-liquefaction becoming like a jelly as it eased the power of Reche’s fist throughout it.

“……Ah, I wonder if I was 0.01 seconds late?”

Reche grins wryly.

She couldn’t make it in time. Just before she hit her fist, the perceiving sense of the eye of God made it necessary in time.

Two attacks of light cannon ──

Reche is blown away by the light cannon which got shot out of both eyes.

However,

“Nnn… For heaven’s sake! Does anyone make a girl do such kind of things, normally.”

With the clothes, or the so-called clothes burned completely.

The eyes of the girl even though having her pure white naked body exposed, was shining.

“Fei, I have put a slit in that~”

“Ok~”

Passing by Reche who was descending, Fei jumped yet above with the help of kicking the head portion of the sky whales on his way.

Up, higher, and high.

I will aim for its right eye. There was already a wound that was born unable to stop Resch’s fist perfectly.

It just needs one more blow.

Even if it is with a human power, it would be enough with one more blow.

“It’s the last strike, Ouroboros!”

The flash light cannon accumulates in the God’s eyes yet again.

 

Which is faster?

Will the human fist shatter away the god?

Or will the counterattack of God completely dismantle the human?

The outcome of that was awaited with bated breath by not only Pearl and Reche.

The real world ──

The head of the office, Miranda, and the flame-blossom apostles who had dropped out. In addition to them, perhaps even the whole world too, who must be watching this extreme battle against the undefeatable god through the broadcast by the Mystic Court.

 

“Let’s go!”

Fei raises his right hand.

God’s right eye shines.

Their timing was exactly the same.

But everyone watching this battle knew it instinctively. Being simultaneous lacks.

A human’s fist cannot exceed the speed of sound. However, God’s attack is the speed of light. Therefore, with the speed of nine times that of Fei, Ouroboros’ attack would shoot down Fei first.

Therefore, everyone thought.

Even after all this, we still can’t win? Even after pushing it to the corner this far, will it remain impossible to destroy the status of the God as undefeated──────────. ──────────

“Why are they thinking that indeed?”

The boy who challenged the god. Faye Theophilus did not clench her fists.

 

His index finger was straight on.

He was fearlessly pointing it at the right eye, which was about to flash.


 

“It’s time for answers, God!”

Flash-Light Cannon.

The very moment when the light-cannon was about to hit the defenceless Fei.

“Move/Shift it!”

“Whimsical Traveller, Activating!”

In that one word.

A golden transition gate gets enacted, and Fei who jumped right into it disappears. I teleport, and I return back to the sky whale where Pearl was still riding.

And then.

The flash emitted from the right eye cuts through the sky due to the disappearance of the target going like a stray bullet.

From the back──

Ouroboros’ left eye burned itself.

“It is God himself who defeats God. This was Ouroboros, this was the method to your capture.”

It was exactly so.

Reche’s attack on the God’s Eye was just a way to buy time.

 

It was all so that Fei could get closer. Even that approach was to hide Pearl’s trump card of space transfer and to guide the flashing line of fire.

“You’ve played long enough. So.”

He kept his finger pointed at her.

“For this time’s result, it’s our victory.”

R-I-I-I-I-I—I-I-I-T-T-T-su…………

Like the sound from some supreme bell.

As if like the sound of an angel’s bell ringing.

The giant red-jade eye of the God shattered to pieces with a clear sound. And then “──────────”

The infinite God Ouroboros.

That day. The people of the world who followed the games with gods rejoiced altogether.

 

The live broadcast from the Mystic City of Ruin and its Mystic Court branch recorded an unprecedented amount of viewership rarely seen even in history.

Not only the apostles, but the citizens as well.

The whole world was watching and hoping in favour of the battle.

The defeat of the God. And to top it off, the opponent was the god of infinite Ouroboros.

Chapter 4.17

 

Translated by: Darkapta
 Edited by: Hinagiku

 

 

An undefeated god that no saint nor genius of the past could defeat. Against that sort of God.

“………… Good gracious, is what I am seeing, true?”

The throat was dry due to tension.

Due to looking at the monitor constantly, forgetting to breathe even, my head gave me a slight headache due to lack of oxygen.

 

Still, the head manager, Miranda couldn’t take her eyes off the live broadcast.

 

Of course, even her subordinates who were watching along with her had the same reaction.

The same was true for others as well.

 

Without any concern that it was late at night, hundreds of people were gathered under the huge screens attached to the skyscrapers in the city.

“When I saw that they got pulled into the game with One of those “three impossible’ games, with Ouroboros. I gave up in their victory but …… wawa, they really pulled it off those guys. They’ve won against it ……”

 

A Great Applause.

 

Mysteriously, when Miranda returned to her senses, at the same time, loud applause and ovation echoed from the men in the room and also from the middle and corners of the streets outside.

Probably ──

The same phenomenon is occurring in cities all around the world.

Just now, there was a report that the servers at the headquarters were down due to the surge in the number of simultaneous viewership worldwide.

“…… Fuu. Even though my rampant internal feelings tell me to let go of my emotions and celebrate. Should I go back to do my work as an administrative official? I won’t let your hard work go for naught, Fei.”

I got up from the sofa with a momentum.

The game with gods is not just a one-time event.

Since there exists a possibility to “draw” the game with Ouroboros yet again someday in future, this was the time to formulate a strategy to conquer.

Analysing the strategy formulated by Fei and his companions. Again, optimizing and spreading it such that it can be reproduced by any apostle. Is also the job of the Mystic Court.

Of course, it’s not an easy task, but well, it seems to be worth the effort. …… Ahh you guys, tonight I’m going to stay up, so can you fill me a cup of coffee?”

Asking her subordinates fast before they left, the head manager Miranda looked up at the ceiling in reminiscence.

“I wonder with what sort of emotions are the members of the team “Light of Flame Blossom” looking at this.

In the “First Dive Centre” of the Mystic Court Ruin Branch.

“…………”

There were almost a dozen of apostles who were looking at the monitor as if they would engulf it in the very next instance.

And while the captain Ovan and his team members of “Light of Flame Blossom” were looking at ── The God of Infinite, Ouroboros gave out a scream.

It was perfect. It cannot be described as anything less than a perfect victory.

 

But apart from that, the point to be noted was that the ordeal was achieved by Dragon God Leo Reche, Apostle Fei and moreover, in the centre of the penultimate turning of tables, at the very last instance was their previous member of the team.

“…… H—ha , what a surprise.”

As if losing all his strength, with a motion of falling onto his knees, Looking up at the blonde girl on the monitor, Captain Ovan couldn’t help but chuckle wryly.

“Pearl has won. And since the play with gods is played as a single player game ……, which results onto that we, who also challenged it together with them, also won against Ouroboros. ……”

[TL note: Here I made it look like the whole team is a single person. If anyone can give me a better translation、 you are much welcome 😊 here: 「パールが勝利した。神々の遊びは一蓮托生……つまり同時に挑んだ私たちもウロボロスに勝利したことになる……」]

Their name will be counted in the sole persons who were able to win against the God of Infinite Ouroboros.

It was such a degree of honour.

I couldn’t believe that the return apology against that defeat would come back in such a—such a huge way.

“Cheers Pearl. It’s my complete loss…… It was brilliantly done.”

Exhaling heavily, Captain Ovan relaxed his shoulders sighing “yare yare” in front of everyone.

So that even his fellow team members could see him doing that.

“As you can see, my men, that we definitely got, or debts repaid. Although the repaid sum is a little too big for us.”

 

And there I thought.

If it is the three of them,

Then really.

The three of them may indeed achieve the unprecedented and complete victory against the conquest of game with gods.

4.3

A spiritual Upper realm, the “Playground of the Gods,”

 

In a world filled with infinitely extending blue skies with seas of clouds ──

“Reche-san, clothes, clothes! I—I’ll lend you my jacket!”

“Hmm? Ah It doesn’t matter anyways. It’ll be repaired as soon as we return back to the real world.”

“I’m feeling Embarrassed!”

As soon as Reche jumped onto the sky whale, Pearl hurriedly went to see her and pushed some clothes onto her in reaction.

At present, Reche was buck naked.

This was basically because of getting hit by the Light Beam counterattack by the God, which in turn burned down her clothes completely.

“Even now, our video is being broadcast Live and watched by the whole world. Reche san’s naked body is also being broadcast live to the whole world along with that…….”

“I don’t mind at all though…”

“Please be a bit shyer about it! Fei-san, Fei-san, don’t you dare look over here just yet, you hear me!”

 

“Ah, sure, sure.”

It was Fei who had his back turned against the naked Reche.

Even though he cannot look back at them anyways, well he just couldn’t take his eyes off the scene happening above him anyway.

The crimson jade “eye” now shattered into pieces.

The crystalline body that used to be the Eye of God is now floating on the air in a thousand brightly coloured pieces.

Reflecting light in several colours and glittering.

It was as if thousands and thousands of red balls were floating in the sky. The sky was so blue that it looked as if it had just turned into a sunset.

Chapter 4.18

 

Translated by: Darkapta
 Edited by: Hinagiku

 

 

And “What is it now?”

 

A huge roar rang out.

The Ouroboros, which had screamed just moments ago, once again spoke out to them once again.

 

“Wha-What is it now? Will something more happen, yet!”

 

“Don’t tell me, continuation of the game …….”

“Fei san! That is something you can’t say even as a joke!? Ah, I can’t do it anymore. Reche san also has her clothes torn to pieces, and I am also in my limit.”

Pearl prayed, although screaming.

As Fei and the others watched over the sky whale, something suddenly flew out of the sky, among the thousands of shattered crystals covering the sights.

 

A silver-haired girl dressed in a Kimono.

She was smaller and looked younger than Pearl.

 

I didn’t have any recognition of her, but I intuitively understood what she actually was.

With one eye closed.

 

The other eye was a crimson coloured with a colour of curiosity glowing brightly through it.

 

The spiritual-material body of a god.

 

Just like Dragon God Reche, who got interested in humans, incarnated and took a form of human, similarly, the Gods who become interested in humans, albeit in very rare cases, project themselves in such illusions.

“Are you perhaps …… Ouroboros?”

“────”

A girl with silver hair walks through the sky and approaches them.

 

Staring at Fei’s eyes motionlessly, she then looks towards us.

“Ar~re, I got defeated. Was my game too easy?”

A silver-haired girl leaned her head at an angle, and with a cute voice slipped out the following sentences out her mouth. Also the “Muu” sound accompanied by the expression that seems to be a bit dissatisfied while sharpening the mouth just a little, is also full of charm and adorable.

“Way to go Hito-ch~an”

“…… Hito-chan.”

“Un. For this time, I will accept it as my loss. Well, one of the three patterns that I had thought of in my mind being breached, still I have the routes of “wings” and “head” still remaining. Well, I guess I can call it a loss this very time. Though only sometimes.”

 

Her way of speaking was definitely looking down at us.

But well, due to her appearance and voice being so peculiarly contrasting it didn’t look any dignified.

“Next time, I’ll think about a more difficult game for when we meet next time. Let’s play again.”

The girl smiled happily.

She put her hand in the pocket of her kimono and ──, “Oh, right~ right~. I’ll give you this. A fragment of my eye.”

As she said, what she took out of her pocket was a piece of Ouroboros’s own eye.

Out of one of those crystals floating in the air, she held out one to Fei. When Pearl saw it, she jumped in astonishment.

“Oh, ────! Don’t tell me, is it “God’s Divine Crown”!?”

The reward for defeating the god.

It’s not just “one win” that would be credited to you for winning a god’s game.

 

The apostle who fights a battle that satisfies the gods will be given a special “reward”.

 

The “God’s Divine Mercy” ── winning the game without a single dropout.

And the “God’s Crown” ── the first victory over an undefeated God.

This reward was the latter.

 

By gaining victory over Ouroboros, A God who was told and thought to be undefeatable, the “Divine Crown” was given as a “reward” to mark this achievement.

“Precious doesn’t even begin to describe the reward from the gods! Apostles from all over the world are challenging the gods with high difficulty for this very reward!”

*Kokun

Pearl gulped her own breath.

 

Moreover, it’s not just any “reward”. It is the “reward” for defeating the infinite god Ouroboros, a god that the mystic courts all around the world had given up ever being able to conquer. A “reward” from such a God.

“Ju—Just how much valuable does it pack into it? ……”

“Ehh. Well, it is the first time for me to receive this too though.”

He receives the piece of red coloured jade eye fragment from the girl’s hand.

The hand of God, who was now in the form of a little girl, felt wonderfully soft, even though it was just its spiritual-mental body.

“So, it’s not just a stone now is it?”

“Fufu. So do you want to know what sort of amazing effects it punches with it worried Hito-chan~”

The silver-haired girl said so with a teasing smile on her face.

“Of course, there is, It has the best ever effect anyone can ever think about.”

“And that is……”

“When you have this fragment of eye with yourself, you can “draw” me whenever you want. Now you can play with me anytime you want. Come again okay~”

The divine crown, the “Eye of Ouroboros”. ──

When you dive into the playground of the gods, if you have this, you will definitely be able to “draw” Ouroboros’ game. You will not encounter any other gods’ game.

And that very Ouroboros declares that for the next game, she would mercilessly raise the difficulty even more.

 

“……”

“……”

“……”

Fei, Pearl, and Reche went dead silent.

 

The expression of the three people became threatening as time went by, but it seems that the reason was apparently not understood by God.

‘Ah? arre? You aren’t happy? You can play with me anytime you want, for the next time you can play an even more difficult game too you know? And I assure you, for the next one I will make it a hundred times harder… ── “

“Who do you think would even do THAT!”

 

“Think about the difficulty level, please, THE DAMN DIFFICULTY LEVEL!”

“Me too, I would want to pass, getting my clothes ripped off willingly again, either!”

In the playground of Ouroboros, the screams of three angry people echoed loudly.

 

VS “Infinite Growth” Ouroboros.

Forbidden Word Game.

In 11 hours, 17 minutes, and 29 seconds,

“Victory”

[Victory condition]

To make Ouroboros say “Ouch”.

[Defeat condition]

All participants must drop out.

[Hidden Rule 1]

If you attack Ouroboros’ tail, it will counterattack.

[Hidden Rule 2]

When Rule 1 is achieved, the sky whale can be used for a certain amount of time.

Victory reward: “Eye of Ouroboros”.

(Difficulty: “Mythic Level”)

4.4

On a later date.

Seven days after the first game victory against the infinite god Ouroboros.

The Mystic Academy succeeded in formulating a strategy based on the game played by Fei and his companions. Based on this, the apostles who had triumphantly challenged Ouroboros──

All of them were in despair.

“What the heck is going on, Fei-kun!?”

 

“What is it, Head Manager?”

“I borrowed the Eye of the Ouroboros from you that you got that other day. Then, there was a team that used it to challenge that God. But still …….”

“And still?”

“The size of God had grown humongously you know!? It grew from being ten kilometers long to a hundred kilometers long and the sky whale wasn’t a neutral monster and was completely under the god’s control though!?”

 

“…… Ah.”

Seeing the screaming lamenting face of Head Manager Miranda, Fei put up his arms in submission (*sfx pon).

“As I thought, she did raise the difficulty level even more eh. You must have been very frustrated looking at that weren’t you too.”

Even the gods have their own Pride.

Even the Gods would feel frustrated whenever they would lose.

“Well, isn’t it okay? When you lose, it feels frustrating, and that’s why it’s fun.”

 

“WHAT IS!?”

That’s what it is.

Whether you Win or lose,

Let’s play again.

That’s the best part,

The thrill of playing a game.

That is


 

Chapter 5.1

 

Translated by: Darkapta
 Edited by: Hinagiku

 

 

 

Chapter 5: Here Comes New Challengers

The world’s three absolute “impossible” ──

 

The defeat of one such pillar, that was considered to be “impossible” in the world, The Infinite God Ouroboros, was spread throughout the vast continent, almost every corner of the world via live broadcast.

 

Here, in a land far away from the Fei’s Sacred City of Ruin ──

 

In the city of sacred springs, Maru-Ra is among one such place.

 

Some thousands of spectators gazed at the monitors mounted on the corner walls of the buildings, cheering wildly as they witnessed the first ever feat.

 

Amidst it all.

“────────”

 

The Mar-La branch of the Mystic Court.

A young man in the black coat standing there was silently looking up at the screen showing Fei and his companions.

 

The defeat of a God.

There was one individual who kept watching the feat that prolonged for more than 10 hours, the complete fierce fighting, waking overnight, without taking any rest.

 

“…… Nice gameplay. Fei fellow.”

The young man smiled fearlessly

And then.

 

“Interesting!”

A roar.

Darks Gear Scimitar.

 

A boy hailed to be the best apostle of the Holy Spring City of Mar-La, and the best newcomer of the previous year.

 

“Fei, it seems that we are destined to meet each other. Me of this year, and you, the year before that. Which one of us is the best newcomer in recent years? …… Kelrich!”

“What is it, Darks?”

“The day of reckoning is near. You’d better hone up your skills too.”

“Yes.”

 

The one who responded to him sophistically was a brown-skinned girl who was waiting next to Darks.

The female apostle was quiet and looked like a secretary. She looks up at the monitor and tilts her head lightly.

 

“So, you came to like this Fei fellow?”

“Yeah, the best.”

 

Darks nodded in satisfaction.

 

“Finally. After so long, a man who can properly compete with me on equal terms in the game has arrived.”

“…… Hmm.”

“What’s up, Kelrich?”

 

“Even though you said that same thing before too, Later sighing after fighting him was completely below expectations.”

The girl who was called Kelrich gave a gaze seemingly suggesting that she had given up arguing.

 

“Darks. Shouldn’t you expect less than what you are now?”

“This case is different. This man is the real deal.”

“…… just by looking at the live broadcast.

“I can understand.”

 

“…… It’s an apostle from another city. You can’t be sure he’ll accept a duel against you, Darks.“

“They are ambitious, Kelrich. These are ambitions themselves.”

 

“?”

 

“A man who loves to play games, would never run away when challenged to a game, can he”

 

He flipped his coat.

Walking straight past the branch of Mar-La of Mystic court, Darks clenched his fists tightly.

 

“I’ll be waiting, Fei, for the time of our duel!”

 


 

Ruin, the City of Miracles, from where Fei hailed.

And the Mar-La, the Sacred City of Holy Spring, where Darks was.

 

Apart from them, in the southern part of the world continent, far away from even those two cities ──

 

The mythical city of Heket-Sherazade.

A huge city floating several kilometers above the ground.

In the heart of that city. The Mystic Court’s headquarters, in its very main hall, there was one girl present there.

 

“────────”

 

Staring up at the monitor.

 

Overlooking the instance when the Infinite God Ouroboros, in the very first time of human history, was defeated.

 

“…… strange humans.”

The girl tilted her head.

“……I thought that victory was only possible because of that Dragon God Leo Reche being there, but ……”

Silence.

 

No one answered the murmur by that girl.

Well, It was quite obvious, since there was none other than this young girl present over here, in this great hall from the beginning.

 

“Fei Theophilus. With this your wins in the “Play with Gods” are 5:0, 0 losses ……”

 

Five wins in a row against the gods in a head-to-head brain battle against them.

 

It was an overwhelming record. It’s not a result that can be attributed all to luck.

 

“Fei ……, who the h**l is this person ……?”

There is no such special background.

 

There were no documents sent by the Ruin branch of the Mystic Court like, for example, receiving any special game training from an early age or such records were none.

 

However, there is just one thing that is listed as “Special Notes” in his history section.

──At Childhood.

── He was trained to play games by a girl who he addressed as “Onee-chan”.

This is Fei’s own self-report.

It’s the only thing that makes him and supports his strength.

“…… “Onee-chan? Who the h**l is that?”

 

A second silence.

And then.

“…… All is naught.”

The girl shook her head tenderly.

 

No one but us are allowed to completely conquer against the “Play with Gods”.

 

St. Helenaia.

The girl who was made up the world’s strongest team “The Gathering Place of all Souls” murmured so, and from the center of the great hall, disappeared as if melting into the light.

Chapter 5.2 Tutorial

 

Translated by: Darkapta
 Edited by: Hinagiku

 

 

TUTORIAL: That’s it for the Tutorial

The Mystic Court Building.

 

In the café on the fifth floor where the afternoon sun shined brightly.

“──Just like this.”

“I—It’s already enough Captain!…… It is I who should be apologising for the mistake I made about half a year ago”

Pearl Diamonds was waving her hands in desperation to the man on the opposite end of the table.

A man who ranks above her. Moreover, being apologised with his head bowed by a person who was once the captain of the team, “Light of the Blazing Flower”, Captain Ovan, until a few days ago, was something beyond her imaginations.

“You have even allowed me to have lunch with you……, for me it’s more than enough already……”

“Umu”

The captain raised his face with a crooked-imposing look.

“I’ve been talking to my teammates up until today. The whole team wants to apologize to you.”

“As I said, it’s already enough!?”

“I knew you’d say that that’s why I came alone today to talk to you today.”

The captain drank the water out of the glass with great vigour.

By the way, this was his fourth glass of water at present.

“…… I know it’s quite convenient as it may have a sound, but I just wanted to tell you this. The fact that we lost for your mistake at that time, I think it to be quite unavoidable by the situation.”

 

“…… Is that really so?”

“I tried to tell you that the next day, but you stayed holed up in the girls’ dormitory and didn’t come out. You didn’t even answer your phone.”

 

“I’m sorry!?”

Now, it was Pearl’s turn to return an apology.

 

“But—Because … even I …… couldn’t face you properly anymore, and I thought that captain also had a grudge against me for letting you be crushed. ……”

“Can’t you get anything done to that unassuming habit of yours?”

The captain gave a small wry smile.

“And just to let you know. I still have the seat that you left, still available.”

“…………”

“If you’re up for it, you can always come back any── “

“Thank you, Captain.”

While gently interrupting

Pearl bowed her head to her previous boss with respect.

“Since it is you, Captain, I will say it rather than keeping it at hold. Captain, I have found the people with whom I want to try and team up with.”

“I see.”

Her former boss laughed slightly.

I knew – I knew I would be rejected, and I already had an idea from the start about the team Pearl wanted to join.

“If you’d like, …… we can do a practice session between our team someday. A practice duel is also fine. Nevertheless, if there’s anything we can do to help, just let me know.”

Thank you.”

Standing up and bowing yet again.

 

Being sent off by a smile from Captain Ovan, Pearl made her way out the cafe.

The Mystic Court Building.

On the vast grounds the sun was shining brightly. This city, Ruin, is situated in the region to the north, close to the great cold wind turbulence. The cold air and the sun’s heat waves mix together to create a cold yet warm atmosphere…

── In such a courtyard.

“Reche.”

“Hmm?”

Fei called out to the girl who was lying on the lawn looking at the clouds, walking towards her.

Head Manager Miranda has given her permission. For the time being, we three including Pearl are accepted to participate. Although, I want a few more in our team.”

“Good, good. It seems Miranda also understands doesn’t she”

Reche said, raising up her upper body.

 

Due to lying directly on top of the grass, her flame-hair which seemed like fire itself was filled with grass soot. Unfortunately, the said person herself is indifferent to such a thing it seems.

“Okay then! Now that all the necessities have been fulfilled, let’s challenge an another game with gods!”

“Denied.”

“WHY!?”

 

“The mouth of the statue is yet to open up. One of them opened two days ago, but the applications for it filled up quickly. Miranda says the other teams also seem to be motivated.”

It was the perfect stimulant for them.

 

I was told that the apostles from all over the world who were challenging the play of the gods were inspired by watching Fei and his team defeating the infinite god Ouroboros.

“Then what can we even do!”

 

“Well, we can’t do anything other than make reservations and wait for our turn. Also, they seem to want me to apply for a team name anyways.”

“…… Mmm.”

 

Reche sat down on her knees.

The moment Fei thought that her expressions and gestures resembled a child who is incredibly dissatisfied, suddenly she brightens up her expressions.

“Well, it’s fine. Now it’s kind of fun to wait for it too. Hey, Fei, from now on, every morning come to my room and play until the colossus opens. Pearl, too ok~.”

“How about assembling every morning by nine o’clock?”

“Of course, we’ll stay overnight. I’ll allow you to take a nap for two hours a day. I’ll arrange caffeine pills and a variety of energy drinks for the same too.”

“I’M SCARED!?”

“…… You know, I am really excited on the future from here on out.”

With an innocent smile.

The girl, the former god said so, looking up against the shining sun.

“I’ve once said this before “Bring me the best player of this era”. I waited and waited, wondering what kind of person would come, and the one who got sent were you.”

“…………”

“You exceeded my expectations, just as I had hoped.”

While looking up at the sky.

A girl with flame-like hair, gave a side peek towards me with one of her eyes.

“And there is this another one ──”

“Nn?”

 

“The girl that you are looking for. You’re the one who said that. I’m sure that person also loves to play so much that she just can’t get enough of it. I want to try meeting her as well.”

“I’ll introduce you when I am able to find her. I’m sure we’ll definitely get along as well.”

 

But I don’t know why.

I can’t, for some reason, I am unable to envision that future in my mind.

Whenever I try to picture the flame-haired “Onee-chan” and Leo Reche together, the scene becomes blurred and hazy.

They are different people.

There is no possible way they are not different people. But, Yet.

“………”

“Fei?”

 

“Ah, nope, it’s nothing. I was just lost in thought.”

 

Being peeked upon by Reche, I waved my hand hurriedly in response.

“…… Well, It’s okay. In either way. That will be done once everything is accomplished nonetheless.”

“?”

 

“We’ve just begun, haven’t we?”

 

Fei held out his hands onto Reche, who was lying down on the grass.

“First of all, if we don’t enjoy it, it would be such a waste. This ultimate strategic (Brain) battle with these supreme Gods is it.”

 

“────”

“Next time, what kind of gods will prepare what type of game next? Aren’t you also anticipating it?”

Letting her bright flame-like hair flutter in the cool winds, Reche grasped hold of the hand extended by Fei and quickly stood up.

Then facing towards them yet again, she spreads her hands out showing her complete heart desire.

“Of course.”

 

“Come on Fei, let’s play games as much as our heart desires!”


 

Volume 1: Afterword

Afterword

──Bring in the most “playable” person in this era?

I’m sure this story started with such a word from the former god.

Nice to meet you, my name is Hosone Kei.

What do you think of this story, “God is Hungry for Games”?

How was it?

 

The omniscient and omnipotent gods are serious wherever they are and propose the most wonderful brain strategic games to them. This would be the first time for me to challenge the genre of strategy games, and I got really excited while drawing an image of it in my mind of this work.

 

Humans and gods, both have a mindset to hate to lose, while playing every single game challenging each other. I hope I can continue to take pleasure while depicting such a world in my work in the upcoming future as well.

 

This time,

For the release of this story, I got cooperation from many other people.

 

All Professional gamers who are at the forefront of game competitions

(Who are Hosone’s big fans).

 

Prominent writers, editors, illustrators, and manga artists in the light novel industry.

Bookstore staff and bloggers who are familiar with light novels.

People active on making web videos including that of YouTube.

K san, who was in charge and has been working with me on creating this story, Chise Toiro sensei, who took time out of her busy schedule to do the illustrations.

Chise Sensei started from the character design to cover and even the mouth painting, from monochrome to color illustrations, making something which goes beyond Best, literally making “god class” illustrations.

I would like to express my heartfelt sincere gratitude to all of you for your kindness and support. From the bottom of my heart!

And more than anyone else ──

To all those of you who took this book by your hands; thank you, thank you very much!

 

Now then.

As the epilogue of the first volume shows, the game between Fei and Rhes (and Pearl, of course!) has just begun. As the epilogue of the first volume shows up, the play between Fei and Reche (and Pearl, of course!) has just begun.

Volume 2 will probably be released in the spring.

Look forward to Fei’s head-to-head strategic battle against the overwhelming “Army of God”!

See you again in volume 2!

At Dusk in Winter

Hosone Kei
